Ticket.Classification_Name: Data or Process in system not working

TicketMessage.defaultValue: Automated message: Data job has failedJob Failed

properties.description: Link to Sharepoint site "PowerBI data" folder "Excel files"

scripts.text:
-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
	-- 1. 	MANIPULATE GENERAL LEDGER
	-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
	-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
	-- 1.1	CREATE WIP JOURNALS
	-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
	
	IF OBJECT_ID('Core.GL_JE_Lines','U') IS NOT NULL DROP TABLE Core.GL_JE_Lines
	SELECT	*,
			CAST(ISNULL(ACCOUNTED_DR,0) AS MONEY) - CAST(ISNULL(ACCOUNTED_CR,0) AS MONEY) AS ACCOUNTED_AMOUNT,
			CAST(ISNULL(ENTERED_DR,0) AS MONEY) - CAST(ISNULL(ENTERED_CR,0) AS MONEY) AS ENTERED_AMOUNT
	INTO Core.GL_JE_Lines
	FROM	(	
				SELECT		[JE_HEADER_ID], [JE_LINE_NUM], [LAST_UPDATE_DATE], [LAST_UPDATED_BY], [LEDGER_ID], [CODE_COMBINATION_ID], [PERIOD_NAME], [EFFECTIVE_DATE], [STATUS], [CREATION_DATE], [CREATED_BY], [ENTERED_CR], [ACCOUNTED_CR], [DESCRIPTION], [ENTERED_DR], [ACCOUNTED_DR], [Stamp]
				FROM		[RAW].[O.GL_JE_LINES] 
				UNION
				SELECT		[JE_HEADER_ID], [JE_LINE_NUM], [LAST_UPDATE_DATE], [LAST_UPDATED_BY], [LEDGER_ID], [CODE_COMBINATION_ID], [PERIOD_NAME], [EFFECTIVE_DATE], [STATUS], [CREATION_DATE], [CREATED_BY], [ENTERED_CR], [ACCOUNTED_CR], [DESCRIPTION], [ENTERED_DR], [ACCOUNTED_DR], [Stamp]
				FROM		[RAW].[O.GL_JE_LINES_2021]
				UNION
				SELECT		[JE_HEADER_ID], [JE_LINE_NUM], [LAST_UPDATE_DATE], [LAST_UPDATED_BY], [LEDGER_ID], [CODE_COMBINATION_ID], [PERIOD_NAME], [EFFECTIVE_DATE], [STATUS], [CREATION_DATE], [CREATED_BY], [ENTERED_CR], [ACCOUNTED_CR], [DESCRIPTION], [ENTERED_DR], [ACCOUNTED_DR], [Stamp]
				FROM		[RAW].[O.GL_JE_LINES_2020]
				WHERE		[PERIOD_NAME] LIKE '%21%'
			) je

	-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
	-- 1.2	Build Segments in Scope table
	-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------	
	
	IF OBJECT_ID('Core.GL_SegmentsInScope','U') IS NOT NULL DROP TABLE Core.GL_SegmentsInScope
	;WITH IDs AS (
	SELECT 		DISTINCT CODE_COMBINATION_ID 
	FROM 		Core.GL_JE_Lines
	UNION 
	SELECT 		DISTINCT CODE_COMBINATION_ID 
	FROM 		[RAW].[O.GL_BALANCES]
	)
	SELECT 		DISTINCT i.CODE_COMBINATION_ID, 
				SEGMENT1, SEGMENT2, SEGMENT3, SEGMENT4, SEGMENT5, 
				SEGMENT6
	INTO 		Core.GL_SegmentsInScope 
	FROM 		IDs i
	LEFT JOIN 	[RAW].[O.GL_CODE_COMBINATIONS] gcc 
	ON 			gcc.CODE_COMBINATION_ID = i.CODE_COMBINATION_ID

	-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
	-- 1.3	Build Max Dates table
	-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------	

	IF OBJECT_ID('Core.GL_MaxDates','U') IS NOT NULL DROP TABLE Core.GL_MaxDates
	SELECT		FLEX_VALUE,
				VALUE_CATEGORY ,
				COUNT(*) AS [rowcount], 
				MAX(CAST(LEFT([LAST_UPDATE_DATE],10) AS DATE)) AS [maxdate]
	INTO		Core.GL_MaxDates
	FROM		[RAW].[O.FND_FLEX_VALUES_VL]
	WHERE		[VALUE_CATEGORY] IN ('Account Argent','Company Argent','Cost Centre Argent')
	GROUP BY	FLEX_VALUE
	,			VALUE_CATEGORY
	HAVING		COUNT(*) > 1

	-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
	-- 1.4	Build Flex Value Max Date table
	-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------	
	
	IF OBJECT_ID('Core.GL_FlexValueMaxDate','U') IS NOT NULL DROP TABLE Core.GL_FlexValueMaxDate
	SELECT		fv.*, 
				CASE WHEN md.MaxDate IS NULL THEN CAST(LEFT([LAST_UPDATE_DATE],10) AS DATE) ELSE MaxDate END AS [MaxDate]
	INTO		Core.GL_FlexValueMaxDate
	FROM		[RAW].[O.FND_FLEX_VALUES_VL] fv
	LEFT JOIN	Core.GL_MaxDates md 
	ON 			fv.FLEX_VALUE = md.flex_value
	AND			fv.Value_Category = md.VALUE_CATEGORY
	WHERE		fv.[VALUE_CATEGORY] IN ('Account Argent','Company Argent','Cost Centre Argent')

	-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
	-- 1.5	Build GL Descriptions table
	-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------	

	IF OBJECT_ID('Core.GL_Descriptions','U') IS NOT NULL DROP TABLE Core.GL_Descriptions
	;WITH S AS (
				SELECT 'SEGMENT' AS SEGMENT, '' AS [VALUE_CATEGORY]
	UNION 		SELECT DISTINCT SEGMENT1, 'Company Argent' AS [VALUE_CATEGORY] FROM Core.GL_SegmentsInScope	
	UNION  		SELECT DISTINCT SEGMENT3, 'Account Argent' AS [VALUE_CATEGORY] FROM Core.GL_SegmentsInScope	
	UNION  		SELECT DISTINCT SEGMENT2, 'Cost Centre Argent' AS [VALUE_CATEGORY] FROM Core.GL_SegmentsInScope 	
	UNION  		SELECT DISTINCT SEGMENT2, 'Cost Centre Argent' AS [VALUE_CATEGORY] FROM Core.GL_SegmentsInScope 	
	),			
	FMV AS (
	SELECT		DISTINCT fv.FLEX_VALUE, fv.DESCRIPTION, fv.VALUE_CATEGORY
	FROM		Core.GL_FlexValueMaxDate fv
	INNER JOIN	Core.GL_FlexValueMaxDate md 
	ON 			fv.FLEX_VALUE_ID = md.FLEX_VALUE_ID 
	AND 		CAST(LEFT(fv.[LAST_UPDATE_DATE],10) AS DATE) = md.MaxDate
	)
	SELECT		S.SEGMENT
	,			FMV.*
	INTO		Core.GL_Descriptions
	FROM		FMV
	LEFT JOIN   S
	ON 			FMV.FLEX_VALUE = S.SEGMENT
	AND			FMV.VALUE_CATEGORY = S.VALUE_CATEGORY
	WHERE 		S.SEGMENT IS NOT NULL

-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
-- 1.6	Create table containing budget information
-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

	IF OBJECT_ID('tempdb..#BudgetBalances','U') IS NOT NULL DROP TABLE #BudgetBalances
	IF OBJECT_ID('[Finance].[BudgetBalances]','U') IS NOT NULL DROP TABLE [Finance].[BudgetBalances]

	SELECT		gcc.[PERIOD_NAME] AS [Period Name]
	,			CAST(CASE WHEN gp.PERIOD_NUM = '13' THEN '12' ELSE RIGHT(CONCAT('0',gp.PERIOD_NUM),2) END AS INT) AS [Financial Period]
	,			CONCAT('20',RIGHT(gcc.[PERIOD_NAME],2)) AS [Financial Year]
	,			[BUDGET_NAME] AS [Budget Name]
	,			[SEGMENT1] AS [Entity]
	,			e.[Description] AS [Company Name]
	,			[SEGMENT2] AS [Cost Centre]
	,			c.[Description] AS [Cost Centre Description]
	,			[SEGMENT3] AS [Account Number]
	,			a.[Description] AS [Account Description]
	,			fr.[AccountDesc#5] AS [Account Category]
	,			[CURRENCY_CODE] AS [Currency]
	,			[PERIOD_NET_DR] AS [Net Debit]
	,			[PERIOD_NET_CR] AS [Net Credit]
	,			DATENAME(MONTH,CONCAT(CONCAT('20',RIGHT(gcc.[PERIOD_NAME],2)),'-',CAST(CASE WHEN gp.PERIOD_NUM = '13' THEN '12' ELSE RIGHT(CONCAT('0',gp.PERIOD_NUM),2) END AS INT),'-01')) + ' ' + CONCAT('20',RIGHT(gcc.[PERIOD_NAME],2)) AS [Date]
	,			LEFT([BUDGET_NAME],CHARINDEX(' ',[BUDGET_NAME])) AS [Budget Type]
	,			CASE 
					WHEN CAST([PERIOD_NET_DR] AS DECIMAL(28,2)) = 0
						THEN IIF(fr.[AccountDesc#5] = 'Revenue',CAST([PERIOD_NET_CR] AS DECIMAL(28,2)),(-1)*CAST([PERIOD_NET_CR] AS DECIMAL(28,2)))
					ELSE CAST([PERIOD_NET_DR] AS DECIMAL(28,2))
				END AS [Budget]
	,			CONCAT([SEGMENT1],':',[CURRENCY_CODE],':',[SEGMENT3],':',[SEGMENT2],':',DATENAME(MONTH,CONCAT(CONCAT('20',RIGHT(gcc.[PERIOD_NAME],2)),'-',CAST(CASE WHEN gp.PERIOD_NUM = '13' THEN '12' ELSE RIGHT(CONCAT('0',gp.PERIOD_NUM),2) END AS INT),'-01')) + ' ' + CONCAT('20',RIGHT(gcc.[PERIOD_NAME],2))) AS [GL_Budget Link]
	,			CAST(GETDATE() AS DATE) AS [DateStamp]
	INTO		#BudgetBalances
	FROM		[RAW].[O.GL_BUDGET_BALANCES] gcc
	LEFT JOIN	[RAW].[O.GL_PERIODS] gp ON gp.PERIOD_NAME = gcc.PERIOD_NAME 
	LEFT JOIN	Core.GL_Descriptions e ON e.FLEX_VALUE = gcc.SEGMENT1 AND e.VALUE_CATEGORY = 'Company Argent'
	LEFT JOIN	Core.GL_Descriptions a ON a.FLEX_VALUE = gcc.SEGMENT3 AND a.VALUE_CATEGORY = 'Account Argent'
	LEFT JOIN	Core.GL_Descriptions c ON c.FLEX_VALUE = gcc.SEGMENT2 AND c.VALUE_CATEGORY = 'Cost Centre Argent'
	LEFT JOIN	[RAW].[F.FinanceReference] fr ON gcc.[SEGMENT3] = fr.[AccountDesc#9]

	SELECT		bb.*
	,			CASE
					WHEN LEFT([Entity],1) = '3'
						THEN IIF(CAST(LEFT([Account Number],1) AS INT) >= 4,[Budget]/[Rate_P&L],[Budget]/[Rate_BS])
					ELSE [Budget]
				END AS [Budget GBP]
	,			CASE
					WHEN LEFT([Entity],1) != '3'
						THEN IIF(CAST(LEFT([Account Number],1) AS INT) >= 4,[Budget]*[Rate_P&L],[Budget]*[Rate_BS])
					ELSE [Budget]
				END AS [Budget EUR]
	INTO		[Finance].[BudgetBalances]
	FROM		#BudgetBalances bb
	LEFT JOIN	[Finance].[FX_Rates] fx
	ON			bb.[Date] = fx.[Date]

-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
-- 1.7	Manipulate FX Rates table
-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

	IF OBJECT_ID('tempdb..#Dates','U') IS NOT NULL DROP TABLE #Dates
	IF OBJECT_ID('tempdb..#FX_Rates_PreFillDown','U') IS NOT NULL DROP TABLE #FX_Rates_PreFillDown
	IF OBJECT_ID('[Finance].[FX_Rates]','U') IS NOT NULL DROP TABLE [Finance].[FX_Rates]

	;WITH CTE_Dates AS
	(
	    SELECT CONVERT(DATE, (
									SELECT		MIN(CAST(CONCAT([Year],'-',[Month],'-01') AS DATE))
									FROM		[RAW].[FX_Rates]
									WHERE		[Currency] IS NOT NULL
								)) AS Dates
	 
	    UNION ALL
	 
	    SELECT DATEADD(MONTH, 1, Dates)
	    FROM CTE_Dates
	    WHERE CONVERT(DATE, Dates) <= CONVERT(DATE, DATEADD(MONTH,-1,CAST(GETDATE() AS DATE)))
	)
	SELECT		ROW_NUMBER()OVER(ORDER BY [Dates]) AS [RowNumber]
	,			DATENAME(MONTH,Dates) + ' ' + DATENAME(YEAR, Dates) AS [Date]
	INTO		#Dates
	FROM		CTE_Dates

	SELECT		fx.[Currency]
	,			fx.[Rate_BS]
	,			fx.[Rate_P&L]
	,			fx.[Version]
	,			fx.[Year]
	,			fx.[Month]
	,			d.[Date]
	INTO		#FX_Rates_PreFillDown
	FROM		(
					SELECT		*
					,			ROW_NUMBER()OVER(ORDER BY CAST(CONCAT([Year],'-',[Month],'-01') AS DATE)) AS [RowNumber]
					FROM		[RAW].[FX_Rates]
					WHERE		[Currency] IS NOT NULL
				) fx
	FULL JOIN	#Dates d
	ON			fx.[RowNumber] = d.[RowNumber]



	SELECT		FIRST_VALUE([Currency]) OVER (PARTITION BY [Currency Group] ORDER BY CAST([Date] AS DATE)) AS [Currency]
	,			FIRST_VALUE([Rate_BS]) OVER (PARTITION BY [Rate_BS Group] ORDER BY CAST([Date] AS DATE)) AS [Rate_BS]
	,			FIRST_VALUE([Rate_P&L]) OVER (PARTITION BY [Rate_P&L Group] ORDER BY CAST([Date] AS DATE)) AS [Rate_P&L]
	,			ISNULL([Version],'Rolled Forwards')		AS [Version]
	,			ISNULL([Year],RIGHT([Date],4))			AS [Year]
	,			ISNULL([Month],DATEPART(MM,[Date]))		AS [Month]
	,			[Date]
	INTO		[Finance].[FX_Rates]
	FROM		(
					SELECT		*
					,			COUNT([Currency]) OVER (ORDER BY CAST([Date] AS DATE)) AS [Currency Group]
					,			COUNT([Rate_BS]) OVER (ORDER BY CAST([Date] AS DATE)) AS [Rate_BS Group]
					,			COUNT([Rate_P&L]) OVER (ORDER BY CAST([Date] AS DATE)) AS [Rate_P&L Group]
					FROM		#FX_Rates_PreFillDown
				) fx

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
	-- 2.1	Create PY GL
	-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
	IF OBJECT_ID('tempdb..#GL_PY','U') IS NOT NULL DROP TABLE #GL_PY
	IF OBJECT_ID('Core.GL_PY','U') IS NOT NULL DROP TABLE Core.GL_PY;

	SELECT		
	gcc.SEGMENT1 AS [Entity] ,
	e.DESCRIPTION AS [Company Name] , 
	jh.[JE_HEADER_ID] AS [Journal Number] ,
	CONVERT(VARCHAR(10),CAST(LEFT(jh.[CREATION_DATE],10)  AS DATE),103) AS [Date Entered] ,
	CONVERT(VARCHAR(10),CAST(SUBSTRING(jh.[CREATION_DATE],12,8)  AS TIME),108) AS [Time Entered] ,
	CONVERT(VARCHAR(10),CAST(LEFT(jh.LAST_UPDATE_DATE,10) AS DATE),103) AS [Date Updated] ,
	CONVERT(VARCHAR(10),CAST(SUBSTRING(jh.LAST_UPDATE_DATE,12,8) AS TIME),108) AS [Time Updated] ,
	jl.[CREATED_BY] AS [User Entered] ,
	jl.[LAST_UPDATED_BY] AS [User Updated] ,
	CONVERT(VARCHAR(10),CAST(LEFT(jh.DEFAULT_EFFECTIVE_DATE,10) AS DATE),103) AS [Date Effective],
	CONVERT(VARCHAR(10),CAST(LEFT(jh.DEFAULT_EFFECTIVE_DATE,10) AS DATE),103) as [Date of Journal],
	CASE WHEN gp.PERIOD_NUM = '13' THEN '12' ELSE RIGHT(CONCAT('0',gp.PERIOD_NUM),2) END AS [Financial Period] ,
	jh.[JE_source]	AS [Journal Type] ,
	js.[DESCRIPTION] AS [Journal Type Description] ,
	LEFT(jh.[DESCRIPTION],200) AS [Journal Description] ,
	jl.[JE_LINE_NUM] AS [Line Number] ,
	LEFT(jl.[DESCRIPTION],200) AS [Line Description] ,
	jh.[CURRENCY_CODE] AS [Currency] ,
	gl.[CURRENCY_CODE] AS [Entity Currency (EC)] ,
	CASE WHEN CAST(ACCOUNTED_AMOUNT AS MONEY) > 0 THEN 'D' 
		 WHEN CAST(ACCOUNTED_AMOUNT AS MONEY) < 0 THEN 'C' 
		 WHEN CAST(ACCOUNTED_AMOUNT AS MONEY) = 0 AND CAST(ENTERED_AMOUNT AS MONEY) > 0 THEN 'D' 
		 WHEN CAST(ACCOUNTED_AMOUNT AS MONEY) = 0 AND CAST(ENTERED_AMOUNT AS MONEY) < 0 THEN 'C' ELSE 'D' END AS [DC Indicator], 
	CAST(ENTERED_AMOUNT AS MONEY) AS [Signed Journal Amount], 
	CASE WHEN CAST(ENTERED_AMOUNT AS MONEY) >= 0 THEN     CAST(ENTERED_AMOUNT AS MONEY) ELSE 0 END AS [Unsigned Debit Amount], 
	CASE WHEN CAST(ENTERED_AMOUNT AS MONEY)  < 0 THEN ABS(CAST(ENTERED_AMOUNT AS MONEY)) ELSE 0 END AS [Unsigned Credit Amount], 
	CAST(ACCOUNTED_AMOUNT AS MONEY) AS [Signed Amount EC], 
	CASE WHEN CAST(ACCOUNTED_AMOUNT AS MONEY) >= 0 THEN     CAST(ACCOUNTED_AMOUNT AS MONEY) ELSE 0 END AS [Unsigned Debit Amount EC],
	CASE WHEN CAST(ACCOUNTED_AMOUNT AS MONEY)  < 0 THEN ABS(CAST(ACCOUNTED_AMOUNT AS MONEY)) ELSE 0 END AS [Unsigned Credit Amount EC], 
	gcc.SEGMENT3 AS [Account Number] ,
	a.[DESCRIPTION] AS [Account Description] ,
	CASE 
		WHEN gcc.SEGMENT3 IN ('111110','111114','111108','111112') THEN 'Cash and overdrafts' 
		WHEN gcc.SEGMENT3 IN ('122003','122005') THEN 'Other Debtors & Prepayments' 
		WHEN gcc.SEGMENT3 IN ('131003','133006','133012','133014','133027','135001','135005','135009') THEN 'Stock' 
		WHEN gcc.SEGMENT3 IN ('212999','231003','231004') THEN 'Other Creditors' 
		WHEN gcc.SEGMENT3 IN ('311002','311003') THEN 'Share Capital & Reserves#5' 
		WHEN gcc.SEGMENT3 IN ('414002') THEN 'Revenue' 
		ELSE  fr.[AccountDesc#5] 
	END AS [Account Category] ,
	'All' AS [Controlling Area for Cost and Profit Centre] ,
	gcc.SEGMENT2 AS [Cost Centre] ,
	c.[DESCRIPTION] AS [Cost Centre Description] , 
	gcc.SEGMENT2 AS [Profit Centre] ,
	p.[DESCRIPTION] AS [Profit Centre Description] ,
	RIGHT(CONVERT(VARCHAR(10),CAST(LEFT(jh.DEFAULT_EFFECTIVE_DATE,10) AS DATE),103),4) AS [Year] ,
	DATENAME(MONTH,CONCAT(RIGHT(CONVERT(VARCHAR(10),CAST(LEFT(jh.DEFAULT_EFFECTIVE_DATE,10) AS DATE),103),4),'-',CASE WHEN gp.PERIOD_NUM = '13' THEN '12' ELSE RIGHT(CONCAT('0',gp.PERIOD_NUM),2) END,'-01')) 
		+ ' ' + RIGHT(CONVERT(VARCHAR(10),CAST(LEFT(jh.DEFAULT_EFFECTIVE_DATE,10) AS DATE),103),4) AS [Date]
	INTO		#GL_PY
	FROM		Core.GL_JE_Lines jl
	LEFT JOIN	[RAW].[O.GL_JE_HEADERS] jh ON jh.JE_HEADER_ID = jl.JE_HEADER_ID
	LEFT JOIN	[RAW].[O.GL_JE_BATCHES] jb ON jh.JE_BATCH_ID = jb.JE_BATCH_ID
	LEFT JOIN	[RAW].[O.GL_CODE_COMBINATIONS] gcc ON jl.CODE_COMBINATION_ID = gcc.CODE_COMBINATION_ID
	LEFT JOIN	[RAW].[O.GL_LEDGERS] gl ON gl.LEDGER_ID = jl.LEDGER_ID
	LEFT JOIN	[RAW].[O.GL_PERIODS] gp ON gp.PERIOD_NAME = jl.PERIOD_NAME AND gp.PERIOD_SET_NAME = gl.PERIOD_SET_NAME
	LEFT JOIN	[RAW].[O.GL_JE_SOURCES_TL] js ON js.JE_SOURCE_NAME = jh.JE_SOURCE AND js.LANGUAGE = 'US'
	LEFT JOIN	Core.GL_Descriptions e ON e.FLEX_VALUE = gcc.SEGMENT1 AND e.VALUE_CATEGORY = 'Company Argent'
	LEFT JOIN	Core.GL_Descriptions a ON a.FLEX_VALUE = gcc.SEGMENT3 AND a.VALUE_CATEGORY = 'Account Argent'
	LEFT JOIN	Core.GL_Descriptions c ON c.FLEX_VALUE = gcc.SEGMENT2 AND c.VALUE_CATEGORY = 'Cost Centre Argent'
	LEFT JOIN	Core.GL_Descriptions p ON p.FLEX_VALUE = gcc.SEGMENT2 AND p.VALUE_CATEGORY = 'Cost Centre Argent'
	LEFT JOIN	[RAW].[F.FinanceReference] fr ON gcc.[SEGMENT3] = fr.[AccountDesc#9]
	
	WHERE	jl.STATUS = 'P'
	AND		REPLACE(jb.ACTUAL_FLAG,'|','') = 'A'
	AND		ISNULL(jh.CURRENCY_CODE, gl.[CURRENCY_CODE]) <> 'STAT'
	AND 	gcc.SUMMARY_FLAG = 'N'
	AND		YEAR(CAST(GETDATE() AS DATE)) - 1 = CONCAT('20',RIGHT(jl.[PERIOD_NAME],2))



	SELECT		gl.*
	,			CASE
					WHEN [Entity Currency (EC)] = 'EUR'
						THEN IIF(CAST(LEFT([Account Number],1) AS INT) >= 4,[Signed Amount EC]/[Rate_P&L],[Signed Amount EC]/[Rate_BS])
					ELSE [Signed Amount EC]
				END AS [Signed Amount EC GBP]
	,			CASE
					WHEN [Entity Currency (EC)] = 'EUR'
						THEN IIF(CAST(LEFT([Account Number],1) AS INT) >= 4,[Unsigned Debit Amount EC]/[Rate_P&L],[Unsigned Debit Amount EC]/[Rate_BS])
					ELSE [Unsigned Debit Amount EC]
				END AS [Unsigned Debit Amount EC GBP]
	,			CASE
					WHEN [Entity Currency (EC)] = 'EUR'
						THEN IIF(CAST(LEFT([Account Number],1) AS INT) >= 4,[Unsigned Credit Amount EC]/[Rate_P&L],[Unsigned Credit Amount EC]/[Rate_BS])
					ELSE [Unsigned Credit Amount EC]
				END AS [Unsigned Credit Amount EC GBP]
	,			CASE
					WHEN [Entity Currency (EC)] = 'GBP'
						THEN IIF(CAST(LEFT([Account Number],1) AS INT) >= 4,[Signed Amount EC]*[Rate_P&L],[Signed Amount EC]*[Rate_BS])
					ELSE [Signed Amount EC]
				END AS [Signed Amount EC EUR]
	,			CASE
					WHEN [Entity Currency (EC)] = 'GBP'
						THEN IIF(CAST(LEFT([Account Number],1) AS INT) >= 4,[Unsigned Debit Amount EC]*[Rate_P&L],[Unsigned Debit Amount EC]*[Rate_BS])
					ELSE [Unsigned Debit Amount EC]
				END AS [Unsigned Debit Amount EC EUR]
	,			CASE
					WHEN [Entity Currency (EC)] = 'GBP'
						THEN IIF(CAST(LEFT([Account Number],1) AS INT) >= 4,[Unsigned Credit Amount EC]*[Rate_P&L],[Unsigned Credit Amount EC]*[Rate_BS])
					ELSE [Unsigned Credit Amount EC]
				END AS [Unsigned Credit Amount EC EUR]
	,			CONCAT([Journal Number],':',[Line Number]) AS [GL_SL Link]
	,			CONCAT([Entity],':',gl.[Currency],':',[Journal Number],':',[Line Number],':',[Cost Centre],':',gl.[Date]) AS [GL_Transactiion Link]
	,			CONCAT([Entity],':',[Entity Currency (EC)],':',[Account Number],':',[Cost Centre],':',gl.[Date]) AS [GL_Budget Link]
	,			CONCAT([Entity],':',[Entity Currency (EC)],':',[Account Number],':',gl.[Date]) AS [TB_GL Link]
	INTO		Core.GL_PY
	FROM		#GL_PY gl
	LEFT JOIN	[Finance].[FX_Rates] fx
	ON			fx.[Date] = gl.[Date]

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
	-- 3.1	Create PY GL
	-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
	IF OBJECT_ID('tempdb..#GL_CY','U') IS NOT NULL DROP TABLE #GL_CY
	IF OBJECT_ID('Core.GL_CY','U') IS NOT NULL DROP TABLE Core.GL_CY;

	SELECT		
	gcc.SEGMENT1 AS [Entity] ,
	e.DESCRIPTION AS [Company Name] , 
	jh.[JE_HEADER_ID] AS [Journal Number] ,
	CONVERT(VARCHAR(10),CAST(LEFT(jh.[CREATION_DATE],10)  AS DATE),103) AS [Date Entered] ,
	CONVERT(VARCHAR(10),CAST(SUBSTRING(jh.[CREATION_DATE],12,8)  AS TIME),108) AS [Time Entered] ,
	CONVERT(VARCHAR(10),CAST(LEFT(jh.LAST_UPDATE_DATE,10) AS DATE),103) AS [Date Updated] ,
	CONVERT(VARCHAR(10),CAST(SUBSTRING(jh.LAST_UPDATE_DATE,12,8) AS TIME),108) AS [Time Updated] ,
	jl.[CREATED_BY] AS [User Entered] ,
	jl.[LAST_UPDATED_BY] AS [User Updated] ,
	CONVERT(VARCHAR(10),CAST(LEFT(jh.DEFAULT_EFFECTIVE_DATE,10) AS DATE),103) AS [Date Effective],
	CONVERT(VARCHAR(10),CAST(LEFT(jh.DEFAULT_EFFECTIVE_DATE,10) AS DATE),103) as [Date of Journal],
	CASE WHEN gp.PERIOD_NUM = '13' THEN '12' ELSE RIGHT(CONCAT('0',gp.PERIOD_NUM),2) END AS [Financial Period] ,
	jh.[JE_source]	AS [Journal Type] ,
	js.[DESCRIPTION] AS [Journal Type Description] ,
	LEFT(jh.[DESCRIPTION],200) AS [Journal Description] ,
	jl.[JE_LINE_NUM] AS [Line Number] ,
	LEFT(jl.[DESCRIPTION],200) AS [Line Description] ,
	jh.[CURRENCY_CODE] AS [Currency] ,
	gl.[CURRENCY_CODE] AS [Entity Currency (EC)] ,
	CASE WHEN CAST(ACCOUNTED_AMOUNT AS MONEY) > 0 THEN 'D' 
		 WHEN CAST(ACCOUNTED_AMOUNT AS MONEY) < 0 THEN 'C' 
		 WHEN CAST(ACCOUNTED_AMOUNT AS MONEY) = 0 AND CAST(ENTERED_AMOUNT AS MONEY) > 0 THEN 'D' 
		 WHEN CAST(ACCOUNTED_AMOUNT AS MONEY) = 0 AND CAST(ENTERED_AMOUNT AS MONEY) < 0 THEN 'C' ELSE 'D' END AS [DC Indicator], 
	CAST(ENTERED_AMOUNT AS MONEY) AS [Signed Journal Amount], 
	CASE WHEN CAST(ENTERED_AMOUNT AS MONEY) >= 0 THEN     CAST(ENTERED_AMOUNT AS MONEY) ELSE 0 END AS [Unsigned Debit Amount], 
	CASE WHEN CAST(ENTERED_AMOUNT AS MONEY)  < 0 THEN ABS(CAST(ENTERED_AMOUNT AS MONEY)) ELSE 0 END AS [Unsigned Credit Amount], 
	CAST(ACCOUNTED_AMOUNT AS MONEY) AS [Signed Amount EC], 
	CASE WHEN CAST(ACCOUNTED_AMOUNT AS MONEY) >= 0 THEN     CAST(ACCOUNTED_AMOUNT AS MONEY) ELSE 0 END AS [Unsigned Debit Amount EC],
	CASE WHEN CAST(ACCOUNTED_AMOUNT AS MONEY)  < 0 THEN ABS(CAST(ACCOUNTED_AMOUNT AS MONEY)) ELSE 0 END AS [Unsigned Credit Amount EC], 
	gcc.SEGMENT3 AS [Account Number] ,
	a.[DESCRIPTION] AS [Account Description] ,
	CASE 
		WHEN gcc.SEGMENT3 IN ('111110','111114','111108','111112') THEN 'Cash and overdrafts' 
		WHEN gcc.SEGMENT3 IN ('122003','122005') THEN 'Other Debtors & Prepayments' 
		WHEN gcc.SEGMENT3 IN ('131003','133006','133012','133014','133027','135001','135005','135009') THEN 'Stock' 
		WHEN gcc.SEGMENT3 IN ('212999','231003','231004') THEN 'Other Creditors' 
		WHEN gcc.SEGMENT3 IN ('311002','311003') THEN 'Share Capital & Reserves#5' 
		WHEN gcc.SEGMENT3 IN ('414002') THEN 'Revenue' 
		ELSE  fr.[AccountDesc#5] 
	END AS [Account Category] ,
	'All' AS [Controlling Area for Cost and Profit Centre] ,
	gcc.SEGMENT2 AS [Cost Centre] ,
	c.[DESCRIPTION] AS [Cost Centre Description] , 
	gcc.SEGMENT2 AS [Profit Centre] ,
	p.[DESCRIPTION] AS [Profit Centre Description] ,
	RIGHT(CONVERT(VARCHAR(10),CAST(LEFT(jh.DEFAULT_EFFECTIVE_DATE,10) AS DATE),103),4) AS [Year] ,
	DATENAME(MONTH,CONCAT(RIGHT(CONVERT(VARCHAR(10),CAST(LEFT(jh.DEFAULT_EFFECTIVE_DATE,10) AS DATE),103),4),'-',CASE WHEN gp.PERIOD_NUM = '13' THEN '12' ELSE RIGHT(CONCAT('0',gp.PERIOD_NUM),2) END,'-01')) 
		+ ' ' + RIGHT(CONVERT(VARCHAR(10),CAST(LEFT(jh.DEFAULT_EFFECTIVE_DATE,10) AS DATE),103),4) AS [Date]
	INTO		#GL_CY
	FROM		Core.GL_JE_Lines jl
	LEFT JOIN	[RAW].[O.GL_JE_HEADERS] jh ON jh.JE_HEADER_ID = jl.JE_HEADER_ID
	LEFT JOIN	[RAW].[O.GL_JE_BATCHES] jb ON jh.JE_BATCH_ID = jb.JE_BATCH_ID
	LEFT JOIN	[RAW].[O.GL_CODE_COMBINATIONS] gcc ON jl.CODE_COMBINATION_ID = gcc.CODE_COMBINATION_ID
	LEFT JOIN	[RAW].[O.GL_LEDGERS] gl ON gl.LEDGER_ID = jl.LEDGER_ID
	LEFT JOIN	[RAW].[O.GL_PERIODS] gp ON gp.PERIOD_NAME = jl.PERIOD_NAME AND gp.PERIOD_SET_NAME = gl.PERIOD_SET_NAME
	LEFT JOIN	[RAW].[O.GL_JE_SOURCES_TL] js ON js.JE_SOURCE_NAME = jh.JE_SOURCE AND js.LANGUAGE = 'US'
	LEFT JOIN	Core.GL_Descriptions e ON e.FLEX_VALUE = gcc.SEGMENT1 AND e.VALUE_CATEGORY = 'Company Argent'
	LEFT JOIN	Core.GL_Descriptions a ON a.FLEX_VALUE = gcc.SEGMENT3 AND a.VALUE_CATEGORY = 'Account Argent'
	LEFT JOIN	Core.GL_Descriptions c ON c.FLEX_VALUE = gcc.SEGMENT2 AND c.VALUE_CATEGORY = 'Cost Centre Argent'
	LEFT JOIN	Core.GL_Descriptions p ON p.FLEX_VALUE = gcc.SEGMENT2 AND p.VALUE_CATEGORY = 'Cost Centre Argent'
	LEFT JOIN	[RAW].[F.FinanceReference] fr ON gcc.[SEGMENT3] = fr.[AccountDesc#9]
	
	WHERE	jl.STATUS = 'P'
	AND		REPLACE(jb.ACTUAL_FLAG,'|','') = 'A'
	AND		ISNULL(jh.CURRENCY_CODE, gl.[CURRENCY_CODE]) <> 'STAT'
	AND 	gcc.SUMMARY_FLAG = 'N'
	AND		YEAR(CAST(GETDATE() AS DATE)) = CONCAT('20',RIGHT(jl.[PERIOD_NAME],2))



	SELECT		gl.*
	,			CASE
					WHEN [Entity Currency (EC)] = 'EUR'
						THEN IIF(CAST(LEFT([Account Number],1) AS INT) >= 4,[Signed Amount EC]/[Rate_P&L],[Signed Amount EC]/[Rate_BS])
					ELSE [Signed Amount EC]
				END AS [Signed Amount EC GBP]
	,			CASE
					WHEN [Entity Currency (EC)] = 'EUR'
						THEN IIF(CAST(LEFT([Account Number],1) AS INT) >= 4,[Unsigned Debit Amount EC]/[Rate_P&L],[Unsigned Debit Amount EC]/[Rate_BS])
					ELSE [Unsigned Debit Amount EC]
				END AS [Unsigned Debit Amount EC GBP]
	,			CASE
					WHEN [Entity Currency (EC)] = 'EUR'
						THEN IIF(CAST(LEFT([Account Number],1) AS INT) >= 4,[Unsigned Credit Amount EC]/[Rate_P&L],[Unsigned Credit Amount EC]/[Rate_BS])
					ELSE [Unsigned Credit Amount EC]
				END AS [Unsigned Credit Amount EC GBP]
	,			CASE
					WHEN [Entity Currency (EC)] = 'GBP'
						THEN IIF(CAST(LEFT([Account Number],1) AS INT) >= 4,[Signed Amount EC]*[Rate_P&L],[Signed Amount EC]*[Rate_BS])
					ELSE [Signed Amount EC]
				END AS [Signed Amount EC EUR]
	,			CASE
					WHEN [Entity Currency (EC)] = 'GBP'
						THEN IIF(CAST(LEFT([Account Number],1) AS INT) >= 4,[Unsigned Debit Amount EC]*[Rate_P&L],[Unsigned Debit Amount EC]*[Rate_BS])
					ELSE [Unsigned Debit Amount EC]
				END AS [Unsigned Debit Amount EC EUR]
	,			CASE
					WHEN [Entity Currency (EC)] = 'GBP'
						THEN IIF(CAST(LEFT([Account Number],1) AS INT) >= 4,[Unsigned Credit Amount EC]*[Rate_P&L],[Unsigned Credit Amount EC]*[Rate_BS])
					ELSE [Unsigned Credit Amount EC]
				END AS [Unsigned Credit Amount EC EUR]
	,			CONCAT([Journal Number],':',[Line Number]) AS [GL_SL Link]
	,			CONCAT([Entity],':',gl.[Currency],':',[Journal Number],':',[Line Number],':',[Cost Centre],':',gl.[Date]) AS [GL_Transactiion Link]
	,			CONCAT([Entity],':',[Entity Currency (EC)],':',[Account Number],':',[Cost Centre],':',gl.[Date]) AS [GL_Budget Link]
	,			CONCAT([Entity],':',[Entity Currency (EC)],':',[Account Number],':',gl.[Date]) AS [TB_GL Link]
	INTO		Core.GL_CY
	FROM		#GL_CY gl
	LEFT JOIN	[Finance].[FX_Rates] fx
	ON			fx.[Date] = gl.[Date]

-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
	-- 4.1	COMBINE CY AND PY GL
	-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
	
	IF OBJECT_ID('Finance.GL','U') IS NOT NULL DROP TABLE Finance.GL;
	SELECT		*
	INTO		Finance.GL
	FROM		Core.GL_CY
	UNION ALL
	SELECT		*
	FROM		Core.GL_PY
	-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
	-- 4.2	CREATE TB PRE-ADJUSTMENT TABLE
	-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

	IF OBJECT_ID('tempdb..#WIP_TB','U') IS NOT NULL DROP TABLE #WIP_TB;
	SELECT		gcc.SEGMENT1 AS [Entity] ,
				e.[DESCRIPTION] AS [Company Name] ,
				gl.CURRENCY_CODE AS [Entity Currency (EC)],
				glb.PERIOD_YEAR AS [Financial Year],
				gcc.SEGMENT3 AS [Account Number] ,
				a.[DESCRIPTION] AS [Account Description] ,
				CASE 
					WHEN gcc.SEGMENT3 IN ('111110','111114','111108','111112') THEN 'Cash and overdrafts' 
					WHEN gcc.SEGMENT3 IN ('122003','122005') THEN 'Other Debtors & Prepayments' 
					WHEN gcc.SEGMENT3 IN ('131003','133006','133012','133014','133027','135001','135005','135009') THEN 'Stock' 
					WHEN gcc.SEGMENT3 IN ('212999','231003','231004') THEN 'Other Creditors' 
					WHEN gcc.SEGMENT3 IN ('311002','311003') THEN 'Share Capital & Reserves#5' 
					WHEN gcc.SEGMENT3 IN ('414002') THEN 'Revenue' 
					ELSE  fr.[AccountDesc#5] 
				END AS [Account Category],
				RIGHT(CONCAT('0',glb.PERIOD_NUM),2) AS [Financial Period] ,
				glb.PERIOD_NUM ,
				gp.END_DATE	,
				gl.PERIOD_SET_NAME,
				glb.PERIOD_TYPE ,
				CAST(ISNULL(glb.BEGIN_BALANCE_DR,0) AS DECIMAL(28,2)) - CAST(ISNULL(glb.BEGIN_BALANCE_CR,0) AS DECIMAL(28,2)) AS [Period Opening Balance EC] ,
				CAST(ISNULL(glb.PERIOD_NET_DR,0) AS DECIMAL(28,2)) AS [Debit EC] ,
				CAST(ISNULL(glb.PERIOD_NET_CR,0) AS DECIMAL(28,2)) AS [Credit EC] ,
				CAST(ISNULL(glb.PERIOD_NET_DR,0) AS DECIMAL(28,2)) - CAST(ISNULL(glb.PERIOD_NET_CR,0) AS DECIMAL(28,2)) AS [Movement EC],
				(CAST(ISNULL(glb.PERIOD_NET_DR,0) AS DECIMAL(28,2)) - CAST(ISNULL(glb.PERIOD_NET_CR,0) AS DECIMAL(28,2))) + (CAST(ISNULL(glb.BEGIN_BALANCE_DR,0) AS DECIMAL(28,2)) - CAST(ISNULL(glb.BEGIN_BALANCE_CR,0) AS DECIMAL(28,2))) AS [Period Closing Balance EC]
	INTO		#WIP_TB
	FROM		[RAW].[O.GL_BALANCES] glb
	LEFT JOIN	[RAW].[O.GL_CODE_COMBINATIONS] gcc ON glb.CODE_COMBINATION_ID = gcc.CODE_COMBINATION_ID
	LEFT JOIN	[RAW].[O.GL_LEDGERS] gl ON gl.LEDGER_ID = glb.LEDGER_ID 
	LEFT JOIN	[RAW].[O.GL_PERIODS] gp ON gp.PERIOD_NAME = glb.PERIOD_NAME AND gp.PERIOD_SET_NAME = gl.PERIOD_SET_NAME 
	LEFT JOIN	Core.GL_Descriptions e ON e.FLEX_VALUE = gcc.SEGMENT1 AND e.VALUE_CATEGORY = 'Company Argent'
	LEFT JOIN	Core.GL_Descriptions a ON a.FLEX_VALUE = gcc.SEGMENT3 AND a.VALUE_CATEGORY = 'Account Argent'
	LEFT JOIN	[RAW].[F.FinanceReference] fr ON gcc.[SEGMENT3] = fr.[AccountDesc#9]
	WHERE		REPLACE(glb.ACTUAL_FLAG,'|','') = 'A'
	AND			glb.CURRENCY_CODE = gl.CURRENCY_CODE
	AND 		gcc.SUMMARY_FLAG = 'N'
	AND			glb.PERIOD_YEAR  >= YEAR(CAST(GETDATE() AS DATE)) - 1

	IF OBJECT_ID('Finance.TB_PreAdjustments','U') IS NOT NULL DROP TABLE Finance.TB_PreAdjustments;
	;WITH a AS (	
	SELECT MIN(gp.PERIOD_NUM) AS [Min Period], MAX(gp.PERIOD_NUM) AS [Max Period], gb.PERIOD_TYPE, gp.PERIOD_SET_NAME, gp.END_DATE, gp.QUARTER_NUM
	FROM [RAW].[O.GL_PERIODS] gp LEFT JOIN (SELECT DISTINCT PERIOD_TYPE, PERIOD_NUM, PERIOD_SET_NAME, END_DATE FROM #WIP_TB) gb
	ON gb.PERIOD_NUM = gp.PERIOD_NUM AND gb.PERIOD_TYPE = gp.PERIOD_TYPE AND gb.END_DATE = gp.END_DATE
	WHERE gb.PERIOD_NUM IS NOT NULL
	GROUP BY gb.PERIOD_TYPE, gp.PERIOD_SET_NAME,gp.END_DATE, gp.QUARTER_NUM
	)
	SELECT 	t.[Entity] , 
			t.[Company Name] , 
			t.[Entity Currency (EC)] AS [Entity Currency (EC)], 
			t.[Financial Year] , 
			[Account Number] , 
			MAX(LTRIM(RTRIM([Account Description]))) AS [Account Description] , 
			MAX(LTRIM(RTRIM([Account Category]))) AS [Account Category] , 
			--[Spotlight Type] , 
			CAST(a.[Min Period] AS INT) AS [Financial Period] ,
			SUM(CASE WHEN CAST([Min Period] AS INT) <> CAST(t.[Financial Period] AS INT) THEN 0 ELSE CAST(t.[Period Opening Balance EC] AS MONEY) END) AS [Period Opening Balance EC],
			SUM(CAST(t.[Debit EC] AS MONEY)) AS [Debit EC], 
			SUM(CAST(t.[Credit EC] AS MONEY)) AS [Credit EC],
			SUM(CAST(t.[Movement EC] AS MONEY)) AS [Movement EC],
			SUM(CASE WHEN CAST([Max Period] AS INT) <> CAST(t.[Financial Period] AS INT) THEN 0 ELSE CAST( t.[Period Closing Balance EC] AS MONEY) END) AS [Period Closing Balance EC]
	INTO	Finance.TB_PreAdjustments
	FROM 	#WIP_TB t 
	LEFT JOIN a ON a.PERIOD_SET_NAME = t.PERIOD_SET_NAME AND a.PERIOD_TYPE = t.PERIOD_TYPE AND a.END_DATE = t.END_DATE 
	GROUP BY CAST(a.[Min Period] AS INT), t.Entity, t.[Company Name], t.[Entity Currency (EC)], t.[Financial Year], t.[Account Number]
	ORDER BY CAST(a.[Min Period] AS INT) 
	-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
	-- 4.3	CREATE TB WITH ADJUSTMENTS
	-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

	IF OBJECT_ID('tempdb..#FinanceTB','U') IS NOT NULL DROP TABLE #FinanceTB
	IF OBJECT_ID('Finance.TB','U') IS NOT NULL DROP TABLE Finance.TB;

	SELECT		tb.[Entity]
	,			tb.[Company Name]
	,			tb.[Entity Currency (EC)]
	,			tb.[Financial Year]
	,			tb.[Account Number]
	,			tb.[Account Description]
	,			tb.[Account Category]
	,			tb.[Financial Period]
	,			CASE
					WHEN tb.[Financial Period] > 5 AND tb.[Entity] = '331' AND [Account Number] = '211003' AND tb.[Financial Year] = '2022'
						THEN [Period Opening Balance EC] + 572105707.69 - 702.88
					WHEN tb.[Entity] = '331' AND [Account Number] = '211003' AND tb.[Financial Year] > '2022'
						THEN [Period Opening Balance EC] + 572105707.69 - 702.88
					ELSE [Period Opening Balance EC]
				END + CASE
					  	WHEN [Account Number] = '133025'
					  		THEN CAST(ISNULL(git_open.[Adjustment],0) AS MONEY)
					  	ELSE (-1)*CAST(ISNULL(git_open.[Adjustment],0) AS MONEY)
					  END AS [Period Opening Balance EC]
	,			[Debit EC] + CAST(ISNULL(git.[Adjustment],0) AS MONEY) AS [Debit EC]
	,			CASE
					WHEN tb.[Financial Period] = 5 AND tb.[Entity] = '331' AND [Account Number] = '211003' AND tb.[Financial Year] = '2022'
						THEN [Credit EC] - 572105707.69 - 702.88
					ELSE [Credit EC]
				END + CAST(ISNULL(git.[Adjustment],0) AS MONEY) AS [Credit EC]
	,			CASE
					WHEN tb.[Financial Period] = 5 AND tb.[Entity] = '331' AND [Account Number] = '211003' AND tb.[Financial Year] = '2022'
						THEN [Movement EC] + 572105707.69 - 702.88
					WHEN [Account Number] IN ('133025','122001')
						THEN [Period Closing Balance EC] +	CASE
																WHEN [Account Number] = '133025'
																	THEN CAST(ISNULL(git.[Adjustment],0) AS MONEY)
																ELSE (-1)*CAST(ISNULL(git.[Adjustment],0) AS MONEY)
															END 
							- ([Period Opening Balance EC]+ CASE
																WHEN [Account Number] = '133025'
																	THEN CAST(ISNULL(git_open.[Adjustment],0) AS MONEY)
																ELSE (-1)*CAST(ISNULL(git_open.[Adjustment],0) AS MONEY)
															END)
					ELSE [Movement EC]
				END AS [Movement EC]
	,			CASE
					WHEN tb.[Financial Period] >= 5 AND tb.[Entity] = '331' AND [Account Number] = '211003' AND tb.[Financial Year] = '2022'
						THEN [Period Closing Balance EC] + 572105707.69 - 702.88
					WHEN tb.[Entity] = '331' AND [Account Number] = '211003' AND tb.[Financial Year] > '2022'
						THEN [Period Closing Balance EC] + 572105707.69 - 702.88
					ELSE [Period Closing Balance EC]
				END + CASE
					  	WHEN [Account Number] = '133025'
					  		THEN CAST(ISNULL(git.[Adjustment],0) AS MONEY)
					  	ELSE (-1)*CAST(ISNULL(git.[Adjustment],0) AS MONEY)
					  END AS [Period Closing Balance EC]
	,			CASE 
					WHEN [Account Category] = 'Revenue' AND  LEFT([Account Description],12) IN ('Intercompany','Intracompany') THEN '1'
					WHEN [Account Category] = 'Cost of sales' AND  [Account Description] NOT LIKE 'Cost of sales%' THEN '1'
					ELSE '0'
				END AS [Internal Account Flag]
	,			DATENAME(MONTH,CONCAT(tb.[Financial Year],'-',tb.[Financial Period],'-01')) + ' ' + tb.[Financial Year] AS [Date]
	INTO		#FinanceTB
	FROM		Finance.TB_PreAdjustments tb
	LEFT JOIN	[RAW].[GIT_Adjustments_Template] git
	ON			tb.[Entity] = git.[Entity]
	AND			tb.[Financial Year] = git.[Financial year]
	AND			tb.[Financial Period] = git.[Financial Period]
	AND			[Account Number] IN ('133025','122001')
	LEFT JOIN	[RAW].[GIT_Adjustments_Template] git_open
	ON			tb.[Entity] = git_open.[Entity]
	AND			tb.[Financial Year] = CASE WHEN tb.[Financial Period] = 12 THEN CAST(git_open.[Financial Year] AS INT) + 1 ELSE git_open.[Financial Year] END 
	AND			tb.[Financial Period] = CASE WHEN tb.[Financial Period] = 12 THEN CAST(git_open.[Financial Period] AS INT) + 1 ELSE git_open.[Financial Period] + 1 END
	AND			[Account Number] IN ('133025','122001')

	SELECT		tb.*
	,			CASE
					WHEN [Entity Currency (EC)] = 'EUR'
						THEN IIF(CAST(LEFT([Account Number],1) AS INT) >= 4,[Period Opening Balance EC]/[Rate_P&L],[Period Opening Balance EC]/[Rate_BS])
					ELSE [Period Opening Balance EC]
				END AS [Period Opening Balkance (EC) GBP]
	,			CASE
					WHEN [Entity Currency (EC)] = 'EUR'
						THEN IIF(CAST(LEFT([Account Number],1) AS INT) >= 4,[Debit EC]/[Rate_P&L],[Debit EC]/[Rate_BS])
					ELSE [Period Opening Balance EC]
				END AS [Debit EC GBP]
	,			CASE
					WHEN [Entity Currency (EC)] = 'EUR'
						THEN IIF(CAST(LEFT([Account Number],1) AS INT) >= 4,[Credit EC]/[Rate_P&L],[Credit EC]/[Rate_BS])
					ELSE [Period Opening Balance EC]
				END AS [Credit EC GBP]
	,			CASE
					WHEN [Entity Currency (EC)] = 'EUR'
						THEN IIF(CAST(LEFT([Account Number],1) AS INT) >= 4,[Movement EC]/[Rate_P&L],[Movement EC]/[Rate_BS])
					ELSE [Movement EC]
				END AS [Movement EC GBP]
	,			CASE
					WHEN [Entity Currency (EC)] = 'EUR'
						THEN IIF(CAST(LEFT([Account Number],1) AS INT) >= 4,[Period Closing Balance EC]*[Rate_P&L],[Period Closing Balance EC]*[Rate_BS])
					ELSE [Period Opening Balance EC]
				END AS [Period Closing Balance (EC) GBP]
	,			CASE
					WHEN [Entity Currency (EC)] = 'GBP'
						THEN IIF(CAST(LEFT([Account Number],1) AS INT) >= 4,[Period Opening Balance EC]*[Rate_P&L],[Period Opening Balance EC]*[Rate_BS])
					ELSE [Period Opening Balance EC]
				END AS [Period Opening Balkance (EC) EUR]
	,			CASE
					WHEN [Entity Currency (EC)] = 'GBP'
						THEN IIF(CAST(LEFT([Account Number],1) AS INT) >= 4,[Debit EC]*[Rate_P&L],[Debit EC]*[Rate_BS])
					ELSE [Period Opening Balance EC]
				END AS [Debit EC EUR]
	,			CASE
					WHEN [Entity Currency (EC)] = 'GBP'
						THEN IIF(CAST(LEFT([Account Number],1) AS INT) >= 4,[Credit EC]*[Rate_P&L],[Credit EC]*[Rate_BS])
					ELSE [Period Opening Balance EC]
				END AS [Credit EC EUR]
	,			CASE
					WHEN [Entity Currency (EC)] = 'GBP'
						THEN IIF(CAST(LEFT([Account Number],1) AS INT) >= 4,[Movement EC]*[Rate_P&L],[Movement EC]*[Rate_BS])
					ELSE [Movement EC]
				END AS [Movement EC EUR]
	,			CASE
					WHEN [Entity Currency (EC)] = 'GBP'
						THEN IIF(CAST(LEFT([Account Number],1) AS INT) >= 4,[Period Closing Balance EC]*[Rate_P&L],[Period Closing Balance EC]*[Rate_BS])
					ELSE [Period Opening Balance EC]
				END AS [Period Closing Balance (EC) EUR]
	,			CONCAT([Entity],':',[Entity Currency (EC)],':',[Account Number],':',tb.[Date]) AS [TB_GL Link]
	INTO		[Finance].[TB]
	FROM		#FinanceTB tb
	LEFT JOIN	[Finance].[FX_Rates] fx
	ON			fx.[Date] = tb.[Date]


	-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
	-- 4.4	FILTER OUT INTER ACCOUNTS
	-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

	IF OBJECT_ID('Finance.TB_Filtered','U') IS NOT NULL DROP TABLE Finance.TB_Filtered;
	SELECT		*
	INTO		Finance.TB_Filtered
	FROM		Finance.TB 
	WHERE		CASE 
					WHEN [Account Category] = 'Revenue' AND  LEFT([Account Description],12) IN ('Intercompany','Intracompany') THEN 'Remove'
					WHEN [Account Category] = 'Cost of sales' AND  [Account Description] NOT LIKE 'Cost of sales%' THEN 'Remove'
					ELSE 'Keep'
				END = 'Keep'

	-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
	-- 4.5 RECONCILE GL AND TB
	-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

	IF OBJECT_ID('Finance.Reconciliation','U') IS NOT NULL DROP TABLE Finance.Reconciliation
	;WITH	
	GLPivot AS ( 
	SELECT		RIGHT([Date Effective],4) AS [Financial Year],
				[Financial Period] ,
				CAST([Entity] AS NVARCHAR(50)) AS [GL Entity] ,
				[Account Number] AS [GL Account] ,						
				SUM(CAST([Signed Amount EC] AS MONEY)) AS [GL Movement],
				COUNT(1) AS [GL Count]			
	FROM		Finance.GL
	WHERE		RIGHT([Date Effective],4) >= YEAR(CAST(GETDATE() AS DATE)) - 1
	GROUP BY	[Account Number] , CAST([Entity] AS NVARCHAR(50)), [Financial Period], RIGHT([Date Effective],4)
	), 
	TBPivot AS	(
	SELECT		[Financial Year] ,
				[Financial Period] ,
				CAST([Entity] AS NVARCHAR(50)) AS [TB Entity] ,
				[Account Number] AS [TB Account] ,
				[Account Description] AS [Description] ,
				SUM(CAST(ISNULL([Period Opening Balance EC],0) AS MONEY)) AS Opening ,						
				SUM(CAST(ISNULL([Period Closing Balance EC],0) AS MONEY)) AS Closing ,						
				SUM(CAST(ISNULL([Period Closing Balance EC],0) AS MONEY)) - SUM(CAST(ISNULL([Period Opening Balance EC],0) AS MONEY)) AS [TB Movement]
	FROM		Finance.TB_PreAdjustments
	GROUP BY	[Account Number] , [Account Description], CAST([Entity] AS NVARCHAR(50)), [Financial Period], [Financial Year]
	),
	Reconciliation AS (
	SELECT		COALESCE(G.[Financial Year],T.[Financial Year]) AS [Financial Year] ,
				COALESCE(G.[Financial Period],T.[Financial Period]) AS [Financial Period] , 
				COALESCE(G.[GL Entity],T.[TB Entity] ) AS [Entity] ,
				ISNULL(G.[GL Account] , 'NOT IN GL') AS [GL Account] , 
				ISNULL(G.[GL Movement] , 0) AS [GL Movement] ,
				ISNULL(G.[GL Count], 0) AS [GL Count] ,
				ISNULL(T.[TB Account] , 'NOT IN TB') AS [TB Account] ,
				ISNULL(T.[Description] , '') AS [Description] ,
				ISNULL(T.[Opening] , 0) AS [Opening] ,
				ISNULL(T.[Closing] , 0) AS [Closing] ,
				ISNULL(T.[Closing] , 0) - ISNULL(T.[Opening] , 0) AS [TB Movement] ,
				ISNULL([GL Movement],0)- (ISNULL(T.[Closing] , 0) - ISNULL(T.[Opening] , 0)) AS [Difference]
	FROM		GLPivot G
	FULL JOIN	TBPivot T 
	ON			G.[GL Account] = T.[TB Account]
	AND			G.[GL Entity] = T.[TB Entity]
	AND			G.[Financial Period] = T.[Financial Period]
	AND			g.[Financial Year] = T.[Financial Year]
	) 
	SELECT		* 
	INTO		Finance.Reconciliation
	FROM		Reconciliation
	ORDER BY	[Entity], [TB Account]

	-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
	-- 4.6 CREATE YTD RECONCILIATION
	-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

	IF OBJECT_ID('Finance.[ReconcilationYTD]','U') IS NOT NULL DROP TABLE Finance.[ReconcilationYTD]
	SELECT		[Financial Year]
	,			[Entity]
	,			CASE WHEN [GL Account] = 'NOT IN GL' THEN [TB Account] ELSE [GL Account] END AS [GL Account]
	,			SUM([GL Movement]) AS [GL Movement]
	,			SUM([GL Count]) AS [GL Count]
	,			[TB Account]
	,			[Description] 
	,			SUM(CASE WHEN [Financial Period] = '1' THEN [Opening] ELSE 0 END)				AS [Opening Balance]
	,			SUM(CASE WHEN [Financial Period] = [MaxPeriod] THEN [Closing] ELSE 0 END)		AS [Closing Balance]
	,			SUM(CASE WHEN [Financial Period] = [MaxPeriod] THEN [Closing] ELSE 0 END)
					- SUM(CASE WHEN [Financial Period] = '1' THEN [Opening] ELSE 0 END)			AS [TB Movement]
	,			SUM(CASE WHEN [Financial Period] = [MaxPeriod] THEN [Closing] ELSE 0 END)
					- SUM(CASE WHEN [Financial Period] = '1' THEN [Opening] ELSE 0 END)
					 - SUM([GL Movement])														AS [Difference]
	INTO		Finance.[ReconcilationYTD]
	FROM		(
					SELECT		*
					,			MIN([Financial Period]) OVER (PARTITION BY [Financial Year],[Entity],[TB Account] ) AS [MinPeriod]
					,			MAX([Financial Period]) OVER (PARTITION BY [Financial Year],[Entity],[TB Account] ) AS [MaxPeriod]
					FROM		Finance.Reconciliation 
				)r
	GROUP BY	[Financial Year]
	,			[Entity]
	,			CASE WHEN [GL Account] = 'NOT IN GL' THEN [TB Account] ELSE [GL Account] END
	,			[TB Account]
	,			[Description] 
	ORDER BY	ABS(SUM(CASE WHEN [Financial Period] = [MaxPeriod] THEN [Closing] ELSE 0 END)
					- SUM(CASE WHEN [Financial Period] = '1' THEN [Opening] ELSE 0 END)
					 - SUM([GL Movement])) DESC


-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
-- 4.7	Create Entity table
-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
	
	IF OBJECT_ID('[Finance].[EntityDescription]','U') IS NOT NULL DROP TABLE [Finance].[EntityDescription]

	SELECT		[Entity]
	,			[Company Name]
	,			[Entity Currency (EC)]
	,			CASE WHEN LEFT([Entity],1) = '3' THEN 'NL' ELSE 'UK' END AS [Country]
	,			CASE
					WHEN LEFT([Entity],1) = '3' THEN 'Amsterdam'
					WHEN LEFT([Entity],1) = '2' THEN 'Stanlow'
					WHEN LEFT([Entity],1) = '1' THEN 'Motherwell'
					WHEN LEFT([Entity],1) = '9' THEN 'Head Office'
				END AS [Location]
	,			CONCAT([Entity],':',[Company Name]) AS [Entity Name]
	INTO		[Finance].[EntityDescription]
	FROM		[Finance].[GL]
	GROUP BY	[Entity]
	,			[Company Name]
	,			[Entity Currency (EC)]
	,			CASE WHEN LEFT([Entity],1) = '3' THEN 'NL' ELSE 'UK' END
	,			CASE
					WHEN LEFT([Entity],1) = '3' THEN 'Amsterdam'
					WHEN LEFT([Entity],1) = '2' THEN 'Stanlow'
					WHEN LEFT([Entity],1) = '1' THEN 'Motherwell'
					WHEN LEFT([Entity],1) = '9' THEN 'Head Office'
				END
	,			CONCAT([Entity],':',[Company Name])

-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
-- 4.7	Create cost centre table
-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
	
	IF OBJECT_ID('[Finance].[CostCentre]','U') IS NOT NULL DROP TABLE [Finance].[CostCentre]

	SELECT		[Cost Centre]
	,			[Cost Centre Description]
	,			CONCAT([Cost Centre],':',[Cost Centre Description]) AS [Cost Centre Full Description]
	INTO		[Finance].[CostCentre]
	FROM		[Finance].[GL]
	GROUP BY	[Cost Centre]
	,			[Cost Centre Description]
	,			CONCAT([Cost Centre],':',[Cost Centre Description])

/*EXCEPTIONS REPORT TABLES*/

/********************************************************************************************************
	Step 1.1	Create table of sales orders not captured in invoice table
********************************************************************************************************/

	IF OBJECT_ID('[Finance].[SalesOrdersNotInvoiced]','U') IS NOT NULL
		DROP TABLE [Finance].[SalesOrdersNotInvoiced]

	SELECT		*
	INTO		[Finance].[SalesOrdersNotInvoiced]
	FROM		[Core].[SalesOrders] so
	WHERE		[Order Number] NOT IN	(
												SELECT		[Order Number]
												FROM		[Core].[SalesOrders] so
												LEFT JOIN	[Core].[ARInvoices] ar
												ON			so.[Order Number] = ar.[SALES_ORDER]
												WHERE		ar.[SALES_ORDER] IS NOT NULL
										) 
	AND			[Order Number] IN	(
										SELECT	[Document Number]
										FROM	[Finance].[Traceability]
									)

/********************************************************************************************************
	Step 1.2	Create table of invoices not captured in sales orders table
********************************************************************************************************/

	IF OBJECT_ID('[Finance].[InvoicesNotInSalesOrders]','U') IS NOT NULL
		DROP TABLE [Finance].[InvoicesNotInSalesOrders]

	SELECT		* 
	INTO		[Finance].[InvoicesNotInSalesOrders]
	FROM		Core.ARInvoices ar
	WHERE		[SALES_ORDER_LINE] NOT IN	(
													SELECT		DISTINCT [Line ID]
													FROM		[Core].[SalesOrders]
											)

/********************************************************************************************************
	Step 1.3	Create an expanded version of the Trade orders and invoices table
********************************************************************************************************/

	IF OBJECT_ID('[Finance].[ExpandedOrdersAndInvoices]','U') IS NOT NULL
		DROP TABLE [Finance].[ExpandedOrdersAndInvoices]

	SELECT		'PO' AS [Source]
	,			[Order Number]
	,			[Parent Order]
	,			[Supplier/Customer]
	,			[Supplier/Customer Number]
	,			[Agreement Number/Sales Contract Number]
	,			[Item Code]
	,			[Item Description]
	,			[Category Code]
	,			[Agreement Price]
	,			[Quantity]
	,			[Invoice Price]
	,			[Invoiced Quantity]
	,			[Invoice Line Amount]
	,			[Currency]
	,			[Business Unit]
	,			[Inventory Organization Code]
	,			[Inventory Organization Name]
	,			[Ordered Quantity]
	,			[Approval Status]
	,			[Mode of Transport]
	,			[Freight Terms]
	,			[Invoice Number]
	,			[Order Status]
	,			[Transaction Date]
	,			[Invoice Amount]
	,			[EUR USD]
	,			[EUR GBP]
	INTO		[Finance].[ExpandedOrdersAndInvoices]
	FROM		[Trade].[PurchaseOrdersAndinvoices]

	UNION ALL

	SELECT		'SO' AS [Source]
	,			[Order Number]
	,			[Parent Order]
	,			'' AS [Supplier/Customer]
	,			'' AS [Supplier/Customer Number]		
	,			'' AS [Agreement Number/Sales Contract Number]	
	,			[Item Code]
	,			[Item Description]
	,			[Category Code]
	,			NULL AS [Agreement Price]
	,			'' AS [Quantity]
	,			[Invoice Price]
	,			[Invoiced Quantity]
	,			'' AS [Invoice Line Amount]
	,			[Transactional Currency Code] AS [Currency]
	,			[Business Unit Name] AS [Business Unit]
	,			'' AS [Inventory Organization Code]
	,			'' AS [Inventory Organization Name]
	,			'' AS [Ordered Quantity]
	,			'' AS [Approval Status]
	,			'' AS [Mode of Transport]
	,			'' AS [Freight Terms]
	,			'' AS [Invoice Number]
	,			'' AS [Order Status]
	,			[Transaction Date]
	,			[Invoice Amount]
	,			[EUR:USD] AS [EUR USD]
	,			[EUR:GBP] AS [EUR GBP]
	FROM		[Trade].[SalesOrdersAndInvoices]

/********************************************************************************************************
	Step 1.4	Create a rec differences table
********************************************************************************************************/

	IF OBJECT_ID('[Finance].[ReconciliationDifferences]','U') IS NOT NULL
		DROP TABLE [Finance].[ReconciliationDifferences]

	SELECT * INTO [Finance].[ReconciliationDifferences] FROM [Finance].[ReconcilationYTD] WHERE [Difference] <> 0


/********************************************************************************************************
	Step 1.5	Create a grouped version of the traceability table
********************************************************************************************************/

	IF OBJECT_ID('[Finance].[TraceabilityGrouped]','U') IS NOT NULL
		DROP TABLE [Finance].[TraceabilityGrouped]


	SELECT		CAST(LEFT([TRANSACTION_DATE],10) AS DATE) AS [Transaction Date]
	,			[Business Unit Name]
	,			[Subinventory]
	,			CASE WHEN [Unit of Measure] = 'LTR' THEN 'TN' ELSE [Unit of Measure] END AS [Unit of Measure]
	,			SUM(CASE WHEN [Unit of Measure] = 'LTR' THEN [Quantity] * 0.0008745 ELSE [Quantity] END) AS [Quantity]			
	INTO		[Finance].[TraceabilityGrouped]
	FROM		[Finance].[Traceability]
	GROUP BY	CAST(LEFT([TRANSACTION_DATE],10) AS DATE)
	,			[Business Unit Name]
	,			[Subinventory]
	,			CASE WHEN [Unit of Measure] = 'LTR' THEN 'TN' ELSE [Unit of Measure] END
	ORDER BY	CAST(LEFT([TRANSACTION_DATE],10) AS DATE)
	,			[Business Unit Name]
	,			[Subinventory]
	,			CASE WHEN [Unit of Measure] = 'LTR' THEN 'TN' ELSE [Unit of Measure] END


/********************************************************************************************************
	Step 1.5	Create a grouped version of the traceability table with a rolling inventory number
********************************************************************************************************/


	IF OBJECT_ID('[Finance].[TraceabilityGroupedRollingInventory]','U') IS NOT NULL
		DROP TABLE [Finance].[TraceabilityGroupedRollingInventory]

	SELECT		[Transaction Date]
	,			[Business Unit Name]
	,			[Subinventory]
	,			[Unit of Measure]
	,			SUM(CASE
						WHEN [Latest Date Marker] = 'X' THEN ISNULL([Quantity],0)
						ELSE ISNULL([Quantity],0)*(-1)
					END) OVER (PARTITION BY [Business Unit Name], [Subinventory], [Unit of Measure] ORDER BY [Transaction Date] DESC) AS [Rolling Total]
	INTO		[Finance].[TraceabilityGroupedRollingInventory]
	FROM		(

					SELECT		CAST(GETDATE() AS DATE) AS [Transaction Date]
					,			[Business Unit Name]
					,			[Subinventory]
					,			CASE WHEN [Transaction UOM Code] = 'LTR' THEN 'TN' ELSE [Transaction UOM Code] END AS [Unit of Measure]
					,			SUM(CASE WHEN [Transaction UOM Code] = 'LTR' THEN [Primary Transaction Quantity] * 0.0008745 ELSE [Primary Transaction Quantity] END) AS [Quantity]	
					,			'X' AS [Latest Date Marker]
					FROM		[Core].[OnHandBalance]
					GROUP BY	[Business Unit Name]
					,			[Subinventory]
					,			CASE WHEN [Transaction UOM Code] = 'LTR' THEN 'TN' ELSE [Transaction UOM Code] END

					UNION ALL

					SELECT		[Transaction Date]
					,			[Business Unit Name]
					,			[Subinventory]
					,			[Unit of Measure]
					,			[Quantity]
					,			'' AS [Latest Date Marker]
					FROM		[Finance].[TraceabilityGrouped]
					WHERE		[Transaction Date] <> CAST(GETDATE() AS DATE)
					AND			CONCAT([Business Unit Name],[Subinventory]) IN (
																					SELECT		DISTINCT CONCAT([Business Unit Name],[Subinventory])
																					FROM		[Core].[OnHandBalance]
																				)

				) x

activities.name: Exposure And Position Core Tables Script

scripts.text:
/*==================================================================================================================*
 * Project:		Argent																								*
 * Purpose:		Create core tables that will feed in to Exposure and Position data marks							*
 * Description:																										*
 *		1.1		Raw tables pulled from the data warehouse are first checked to see whether there are multiple date	*
 *				stamps in the tables, if there are multiple then older date stamps are deleted and only the most	*
 *				current date stamps data is kept in the table.														*
 *		1.2		"Core.Items" table is created.																		*
 *		1.3		"Core.Organizations" table is created.																*
 *		1.4		"Core.Users" table is created.																		*
 *		1.5		"Core.Suppliers" table is created.																	*
 *		1.6		"Core.Locations" table is created.																	*
 *		1.7		"Core.Parties" table is created.																	*
 *		1.8		"Core.PurchaseCcontracts" table is created.															*
 *		1.9		"Core.PurchaseOrders" table is created.																*
 *		1.10	"Core.SalesContracts" table is created.																*
 *		1.11	"Core.SalesOrders_Fulfilled" table is created.														*
 *		1.12	"Core.OnHandBalance" table is created.																*
 *		1.13	"Core.ReceivingTransactions" table is created.														*
 *		1.14	"Core.FXRates" table is created.																	*
 *																													*
 * Prerequisites: Import the oracle data daily into the raw tables			 										*
 *																													*
 * Outputs: Tables "Core.Items"; "Core.Organizations"; "Core.Users"; "Core.Suppliers"; "Core.Locations";			*
 *			"Core.Parties"; "Core.PurchaseContracts"; "Core.PurchaseOrders"; "Core.SalesContracts";					*
 *			"Core.SalesOrders_Fulfilled"; "Core.OnHandBalance"; "Core.ReceivingTransactions"; "Core.FXRates"		*
 *																													*
 * Impact: If any of the core tables are re-created,																*
 *		   then the trade tables must be edited and data deleted before DataMarks.sql can be re-run					*
 *																													*
 * Date:        29/07/2022																							*
 * Version:     1.0																									*																			
 *==================================================================================================================*
 * Updates:																											*
 * Date		| Version | Author		| Change made																	*
 * -----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*
 * --/--/-- |  1.-	  |				|																				*
 *			|		  |				|																				*
 *==================================================================================================================*/
 

/********************************************************************************************************
	Step 1.1:	Update the raw tables with the current day's data, pulled from the data warehouse.
********************************************************************************************************/

	DECLARE @DeleteTableStatement NVARCHAR(MAX)
	DECLARE Cur2 CURSOR READ_ONLY
	FOR
			SELECT  'Delete from [RAW].[' + TABLE_NAME + ']  where stamp <> (select distinct max(stamp) from [RAW].[' + TABLE_NAME + '])'
			FROM    INFORMATION_SCHEMA.TABLES
			WHERE   TABLE_SCHEMA = 'RAW'
					AND TABLE_TYPE = 'BASE TABLE' and TABLE_NAME like 'O.%'


	OPEN Cur2
	FETCH NEXT FROM Cur2 INTO @DeleteTableStatement
	WHILE @@FETCH_STATUS = 0
		  BEGIN
				PRINT 'Executing ' + @DeleteTableStatement
				EXECUTE sp_executesql @DeleteTableStatement
				FETCH NEXT FROM Cur2 INTO @DeleteTableStatement
		  END
	CLOSE Cur2
	DEALLOCATE Cur2

/********************************************************************************************************
	Step 1.2:	Create core items table.

				Core.Items is built by joining the tables [RAW].[O.EGP_SYSTEM_ITEMS_B], 
				[RAW].[O.EGP_SYSTEM_ITEMS_TL], [RAW].[O.EGP_ITEM_CAT_ASSIGNMENTS], [RAW].[O.EGP_CATEGORIES_B],
				[RAW].[O.EGP_CATEGORY_SETS_TL]

				[RAW].[O.EGP_CATEGORY_SETS_TL] is filtered for [CATEGORY_SET_NAME] = 'Argent Catalog'

********************************************************************************************************/

	IF OBJECT_ID('[Core].[Items]','U') IS NOT NULL
		DROP TABLE [Core].[Items]

	SELECT		CAST(ib.[INVENTORY_ITEM_ID] AS NVARCHAR(255))					AS [Inventory Item ID]
	,			CAST(ib.[ORGANIZATION_ID] AS NVARCHAR(255))					AS [Organization ID]
	,			CAST(ib.[ATTRIBUTE1] AS NVARCHAR(255))						AS [European Waste Code]
	,			CAST(ib.[ATTRIBUTE11] AS NVARCHAR(255))					AS [Dutch Item Name]
	,			CAST(ib.[ATTRIBUTE13] AS NVARCHAR(255))					AS [FATOL]
	,			CAST(ib.[ATTRIBUTE14] AS NVARCHAR(255))					AS [ABP Category]
	,			CAST(ib.[ATTRIBUTE15] AS NVARCHAR(255))					AS [Nature of Commodity EN]
	,			CAST(ib.[ATTRIBUTE18] AS NVARCHAR(255))					AS [Nature of Commodity NL]
	,			CAST(ib.[ATTRIBUTE19] AS NVARCHAR(255))					AS [Treatment Type]
	,			CAST(ib.[ATTRIBUTE21] AS NVARCHAR(255))					AS [Basel Code]
	,			CAST(ib.[ATTRIBUTE25] AS NVARCHAR(255))					AS [Hazardous Material Description]
	,			CAST(ib.[ATTRIBUTE7] AS NVARCHAR(255))						AS [Waste Item]
	,			CAST(ib.[ATTRIBUTE8] AS NVARCHAR(255))						AS [ABP Item]
	,			CAST(ib.[ATTRIBUTE9] AS NVARCHAR(255))						AS [Sustainable Item]
	,			CAST(LEFT(ib.[CREATION_DATE],10) AS DATE)		AS [Item Creation Date]
	,			CAST(ib.[INVENTORY_ITEM_STATUS_CODE] AS NVARCHAR(255))					AS [Item Status]
	,			CAST(ib.[ITEM_NUMBER] AS NVARCHAR(255))								AS [Item Code]
	,			CAST(ib.[ITEM_TYPE] AS NVARCHAR(255))									AS [Item Type]
	,			CAST(LEFT(ib.[LAST_UPDATE_DATE],10) AS DATE)	AS [Item Update Date]
	,			CAST(ib.[PRIMARY_UOM_CODE] AS NVARCHAR(255))							AS [Unit Of Measure]
	,			CAST(it.[LANGUAGE] AS NVARCHAR(255))									AS [Language]
	,			CAST(it.[DESCRIPTION]	 AS NVARCHAR(255))							AS [Item Name]
	,			CAST(it.[LONG_DESCRIPTION] AS NVARCHAR(255))							AS [Long Item Name]
	,			CAST(cat.[ITEM_CATEGORY_ASSIGNMENT_ID] AS NVARCHAR(255))				AS [Item Category Assignment ID]
	,			CAST(cat.[CATEGORY_ID] AS NVARCHAR(255))								AS [Category ID]
	,			CAST(cat.[CATEGORY_CONTENT_CODE] AS NVARCHAR(255))						AS [Category Content Code]
	,			CAST(cat.[CATEGORY_CODE] AS NVARCHAR(255))								AS [Category Code]
	,			CAST(cat.[CATEGORY_SET_ID] AS NVARCHAR(255))							AS [Category Set ID]
	,			CAST(cat.[CATEGORY_SET_NAME] AS NVARCHAR(255))							AS [Category Set Name]
	,			CAST(cat.[DESCRIPTION] AS NVARCHAR(255))								AS [Category Set Description]
	INTO		[Core].[Items]
	FROM		[RAW].[O.EGP_SYSTEM_ITEMS_B] ib
	LEFT JOIN	[RAW].[O.EGP_SYSTEM_ITEMS_TL] it
	ON			ib.[INVENTORY_ITEM_ID] = it.[INVENTORY_ITEM_ID]
	AND			ib.[ORGANIZATION_ID] = it.[ORGANIZATION_ID]
	LEFT JOIN	(
					SELECT		[ITEM_CATEGORY_ASSIGNMENT_ID]	
					,			[INVENTORY_ITEM_ID]
					,			[ORGANIZATION_ID]
					,			ica.[CATEGORY_ID]					
					,			[CATEGORY_CONTENT_CODE]			
					,			[CATEGORY_CODE]					
					,			ica.[CATEGORY_SET_ID]				
					,			[CATEGORY_SET_NAME]				
					,			[DESCRIPTION]					
					FROM		[RAW].[O.EGP_ITEM_CAT_ASSIGNMENTS] ica  
					LEFT JOIN	[RAW].[O.EGP_CATEGORIES_B] cb
					ON			ica.[CATEGORY_ID] = cb.[CATEGORY_ID] 
					LEFT JOIN	[RAW].[O.EGP_CATEGORY_SETS_TL] ct
					ON			ica.[CATEGORY_SET_ID] = ct.[CATEGORY_SET_ID]
					WHERE		ct.[CATEGORY_SET_NAME] = 'Argent Catalog'
				) cat
	ON			cat.[INVENTORY_ITEM_ID] = ib.[INVENTORY_ITEM_ID]


	

/********************************************************************************************************
	Step 1.3:	Create core organizations table.

				Core.Organizations is built by joining the tables [RAW].[O.[RAW].[O.INV_ORGANIZATION_DEFINITIONS_V]], 
				and [RAW].[O.XLE_ENTITY_PROFILES]
				
********************************************************************************************************/

	IF OBJECT_ID('[Core].[Organizations]','U') IS NOT NULL
		DROP TABLE [Core].[Organizations]
		
	SELECT		CAST(o.[ORGANIZATION_ID] AS NVARCHAR(255))							AS [Organization ID]
	,			CAST(o.[ORGANIZATION_CODE] AS NVARCHAR(255))						AS [Inventory Organization Code]
	,			CAST(o.[ORGANIZATION_NAME] AS NVARCHAR(255))						AS [Inventory Organization Name]
	,			CAST(o.[SET_OF_BOOKS_ID] AS NVARCHAR(255))							AS [Set Of Books ID]
	,			CAST(o.[CHART_OF_ACCOUNTS_ID] AS NVARCHAR(255))					AS [Chart Of Accounts ID]
	,			CAST(o.[CURRENCY_CODE] AS NVARCHAR(255))							AS [Currency Code]
	,			CAST(o.[BUSINESS_UNIT_NAME]	 AS NVARCHAR(255))					AS [Business Unit Name]
	,			CAST(o.[BUSINESS_UNIT_ID] AS NVARCHAR(255))						AS [Business Unit ID]
	,			CAST(o.[INVENTORY_FLAG]	 AS NVARCHAR(255))						AS [Inventory Flag]
	,			CAST(o.[LOCATION_ID] AS NVARCHAR(255))								AS [Location ID]
	,			CAST(o.[TIMEZONE_CODE] AS NVARCHAR(255))							AS [Timezone Code]
	,			CAST(ISNULL(le.[LEGAL_ENTITY_ID],'N/A') AS NVARCHAR(255))			AS [Legal Entity ID]
	,			CAST(ISNULL(le.[PARTY_ID],'N/A') AS NVARCHAR(255))					AS [Party ID]
	,			CAST(ISNULL(le.[LEGAL_ENTITY_IDENTIFIER],'N/A') AS NVARCHAR(255))	AS [Legal Entity Short Name]
	,			CAST(ISNULL(le.[NAME],'N/A') AS NVARCHAR(255))						AS [Legal Entity Name]
	,			CAST(ISNULL(le.[GEOGRAPHY_ID],'N/A') AS NVARCHAR(255))				AS [Geography ID]
	,			CAST(ISNULL(le.[ATTRIBUTE_CATEGORY],'N/A') AS NVARCHAR(255))		AS [Legal Entity Country]
	INTO		[Core].[Organizations]
	FROM		[RAW].[O.INV_ORGANIZATION_DEFINITIONS_V] o
	LEFT JOIN	[RAW].[O.XLE_ENTITY_PROFILES] le
	ON			o.[LEGAL_ENTITY] = le.LEGAL_ENTITY_ID
	

/********************************************************************************************************
	Step 1.4:	Create core users table.

				Core.Users using the [RAW].[O.PER_USERS] table
********************************************************************************************************/

	IF OBJECT_ID('[Core].[Users]','U') IS NOT NULL
		DROP TABLE [Core].[Users]
		
	SELECT		CAST([USER_ID] AS NVARCHAR(255))							AS [User ID]
	,			CAST(LEFT([START_DATE],10) AS DATE)	AS [Start Date]
	,			CAST([USERNAME] AS NVARCHAR(255))							AS [Username]
	,			CAST([SUSPENDED] AS NVARCHAR(255))							AS [Suspended]
	,			CAST([PERSON_ID] AS NVARCHAR(255))							AS [Person ID]
	INTO		[Core].[Users]
	FROM		[RAW].[O.PER_USERS] 


/********************************************************************************************************
	Step 1.5:	Create core suppliers table.

				Core.Suppliers is built by joining the tables [RAW].[O.POZ_SUPPLIERS]
				and [RAW].[O.POZ_SUPPLIER_SITES_ALL_M]
********************************************************************************************************/

	IF OBJECT_ID('[Core].[Suppliers]','U') IS NOT NULL
		DROP TABLE [Core].[Suppliers]

	SELECT		CAST(s.[VENDOR_ID] AS NVARCHAR(255))						AS [Vendor ID]
	,			CAST(s.[SEGMENT1] AS NVARCHAR(255))						AS [Supplier ID]
	,			CAST(s.[PARTY_ID] AS NVARCHAR(255))						AS [Party ID]
	,			CAST(s.[ORGANIZATION_TYPE_LOOKUP_CODE] AS NVARCHAR(255))	AS [Organization Type]
	,			CAST(s.[VENDOR_TYPE_LOOKUP_CODE] AS NVARCHAR(255))			AS [Supplier Type]
	,			LEFT(s.[END_DATE_ACTIVE],10)		AS [Supplier Inactive Date]
	,			CAST(ss.[VENDOR_SITE_ID] AS NVARCHAR(255))					AS [Vendor Site ID]
	,			CAST(ss.[PRC_BU_ID] AS NVARCHAR(255))						AS [Prc BU ID]
	,			CAST(ss.[LOCATION_ID] AS NVARCHAR(255))					AS [Location ID]	
	,			CAST(ss.[PARTY_SITE_ID] AS NVARCHAR(255))					AS [Party Site ID]
	,			CAST(ss.[VENDOR_SITE_CODE] AS NVARCHAR(255))				AS [Supplier Site Name] 
	,			CAST(ss.[PURCHASING_SITE_FLAG] AS NVARCHAR(255))			AS [Purchasing Site Flag]
	,			CAST(ss.[PAY_SITE_FLAG] AS NVARCHAR(255))					AS [Pay Site Flag]
	,			CAST(ss.[TERMS_ID] AS NVARCHAR(255))						AS [Terms ID]
	,			CAST(ss.[INVOICE_CURRENCY_CODE] AS NVARCHAR(255))			AS [Site Invoice Currency Code]
	,			CAST(ss.[PAYMENT_CURRENCY_CODE] AS NVARCHAR(255))			AS [Site Payment Currency Code]
	,			LEFT(ss.[INACTIVE_DATE],10)			AS [Site Inactive Date]					
	,			CAST(ss.[ATTRIBUTE17] AS NVARCHAR(255))					AS [VIHB Code]	
	,			CAST(ss.[ATTRIBUTE18] AS NVARCHAR(255))					AS [Vendor Category]	
	,			CAST(ss.[ATTRIBUTE2] AS NVARCHAR(255))						AS [ISCC Cetificate Number]	
	,			LEFT(ss.[ATTRIBUTE_DATE1],10)		AS [ISCC Certificate Expiry Date]
	,			CAST(ss.[ATTRIBUTE1] AS NVARCHAR(255))						AS [Site VET ID]
	,			CAST(ss.[ATTRIBUTE19] AS NVARCHAR(255))					AS [INS Certificate Number]
	,			LEFT(ss.[ATTRIBUTE_DATE2],10)		AS [INS Certificate Expiry Date]				
	,			CAST(ss.[TERMS_DATE_BASIS] AS NVARCHAR(255))				AS [Site Terms Date Basis]
	INTO		[Core].[Suppliers]
	FROM		[RAW].[O.POZ_SUPPLIERS] s
	LEFT JOIN	[RAW].[O.POZ_SUPPLIER_SITES_ALL_M] ss
	ON			s.[VENDOR_ID] = ss.[VENDOR_ID]


/********************************************************************************************************
	Step 1.6:	Create core locations table.

				Core.Locations is built using the [RAW].[O.HZ_LOCATIONS] table
********************************************************************************************************/

	IF OBJECT_ID('[Core].[Locations]','U') IS NOT NULL
		DROP TABLE [Core].[Locations]

	SELECT		CAST([LOCATION_ID] AS NVARCHAR(255))				AS [Location ID]
	,			CAST([Country] AS NVARCHAR(255))					AS [Country]
	,			CAST([ADDRESS1]	 AS NVARCHAR(255))				AS [Company Name]
	,			CAST([ADDRESS2]	 AS NVARCHAR(255))				AS [Address Line 2]
	,			CAST([CITY]	 AS NVARCHAR(255))					AS [City]
	,			CAST([POSTAL_CODE] AS NVARCHAR(255))				AS [Postal Code]
	,			CAST([ADDRESS_STYLE] AS NVARCHAR(255))				AS [Address Style]
	,			CAST([STATUS_FLAG] AS NVARCHAR(255))				AS [Status Flag]
	,			CAST([ADDRESS3] AS NVARCHAR(255))					AS [Address Line 3]
	,			CAST([ADDRESS4] AS NVARCHAR(255))					AS [Address Line 4]
	,			CAST([STATE] AS NVARCHAR(255))						AS [State]
	,			CAST([Province] AS NVARCHAR(255))					AS [Province]
	,			CAST([ADDR_ELEMENT_ATTRIBUTE2] AS NVARCHAR(255))	AS [Area]
	,			CAST([BUILDING] AS NVARCHAR(255))					AS [Building Name]
	INTO		[Core].[Locations]
	FROM		[RAW].[O.HZ_LOCATIONS]
	

/********************************************************************************************************
	Step 1.7:	Create core parties table.

				Core.Parties is built by joining the tables [RAW].[O.HZ_PARTIES]
				and [RAW].[O.HZ_PARTY_SITES]

********************************************************************************************************/

	IF OBJECT_ID('[Core].[Parties]','U') IS NOT NULL
		DROP TABLE [Core].[Parties]

	SELECT		CAST(p.[PARTY_ID] AS NVARCHAR(255))				AS [Party ID]
	,			CAST(p.[PARTY_NUMBER] AS NVARCHAR(255))			AS [Party Number]
	,			CAST(p.[PARTY_NAME] AS NVARCHAR(255))				AS [Party Name]
	,			CAST(p.[PARTY_TYPE] AS NVARCHAR(255))				AS [Party Type]
	,			CAST(p.[STATUS] AS NVARCHAR(255))					AS [Party Status]
	,			CAST(p.[INTERNAL_FLAG] AS NVARCHAR(255))			AS [Internal Party]
	,			CAST(p.[EMAIL_ADDRESS] AS NVARCHAR(255))			AS [Party Email Address]
	,			CAST(p.[DUNS_NUMBER_C] AS NVARCHAR(255))			AS [DUNS Number]
	,			CAST(ps.[PARTY_SITE_ID] AS NVARCHAR(255))			as [Party SIte ID]
	,			CAST(ps.[LOCATION_ID] AS NVARCHAR(255))			AS [Location ID]
	,			CAST(ps.[START_DATE_ACTIVE] AS NVARCHAR(255))		AS [Start Date Active]
	,			CAST(ps.[END_DATE_ACTIVE] AS NVARCHAR(255))		AS [End Date Active]
	,			CAST(ps.[PARTY_SITE_NUMBER] AS NVARCHAR(255))		AS [Party Site Number]
	,			CAST(ps.[STATUS] AS NVARCHAR(255))					AS [Party Site Status]
	,			CAST(ps.[PARTY_SITE_NAME] AS NVARCHAR(255))		AS [Party Site Name]
	,			CAST(ps.[OVERALL_PRIMARY_FLAG] AS NVARCHAR(255))	AS [Primary Party Site]
	INTO		[Core].[Parties]
	FROM		[RAW].[O.HZ_PARTIES] p
	LEFT JOIN	[RAW].[O.HZ_PARTY_SITES] ps		
	ON			p.[PARTY_ID] = ps.[PARTY_ID]


/********************************************************************************************************
	Step 1.8:	Create core purchase contracts table.

				Core.PurchaseContracts is built by joining the tables [RAW].[O.PO_HEADERS_ALL],
				[RAW].[O.PO_LINES_ALL] and [RAW].[O.PO_GA_ORG_ASSIGNMENTS]

				[RAW].[O.PO_HEADERS_ALL] is filtered for [TYPE_LOOKUP_CODE] = 'BLANKET'

				[Blanket Agreement Quantity] is calculated as ([BLANKET_TOTAL_AMOUNT] - 10)/[UNIT_PRICE]
				if [QUANTITY_COMMITTED] is NULL. Otherwise it is set to [QUANTITY_COMMITTED]
********************************************************************************************************/


	IF OBJECT_ID('[Core].[PurchaseContracts]','U') IS NOT NULL
		DROP TABLE [Core].[PurchaseContracts]
		
	SELECT		CAST(pha.[PO_HEADER_ID] AS NVARCHAR(255))																								AS [PO Header ID]				
	,			CAST(pha.[CURRENT_VERSION_ID] AS NVARCHAR(255))																						AS [Current Version ID]
	,			CAST(pha.[DOCUMENT_STATUS] AS NVARCHAR(255))																							AS [Purchase Document Status]
	,			CAST(pha.[PRC_BU_ID] AS NVARCHAR(255))																									AS [Purchasing BU]
	,			CAST(pha.[AGENT_ID] AS NVARCHAR(255))																									AS [Buyer]
	,			CAST(pha.[TYPE_LOOKUP_CODE]	 AS NVARCHAR(255))																						AS [Purchase Document Type]
	,			CAST(pha.[SEGMENT1] AS NVARCHAR(255))																									AS [Blanket Purchase Agreement Number]
	,			CAST(pha.[VENDOR_ID] AS NVARCHAR(255))																									AS [Supplier]
	,			CAST(pha.[VENDOR_SITE_ID] AS NVARCHAR(255))																							AS [Supplier Site]
	,			CAST(pha.[TERMS_ID] AS NVARCHAR(255))																									AS [Terms ID]
	,			CAST(pha.[FREIGHT_TERMS_LOOKUP_CODE] AS NVARCHAR(255))																					AS [Incoterm]
	,			CAST(pha.[CURRENCY_CODE] AS NVARCHAR(255))																								AS [Purchase Document Currency]	
	,			CAST(LEFT(pha.[START_DATE],10) AS NVARCHAR(255))																						AS [Agreement Start Date]			
	,			CAST(LEFT(pha.[END_DATE],10) AS NVARCHAR(255))																							AS [Agreement End Date]		
	,			CAST(pha.[BLANKET_TOTAL_AMOUNT]	 AS NVARCHAR(255))																					AS [Agreement Amount]
	,			CAST(CASE WHEN pha.[AMOUNT_RELEASED] IS NULL THEN '0' ELSE pha.[AMOUNT_RELEASED] END AS NUMERIC(28,2))			AS [Amount Released Against Agreement]	
	,			CAST(pha.[CARRIER_ID] AS NVARCHAR(255))																								AS [Carrier ID]			
	,			CAST(pha.[NOTE_TO_VENDOR] AS NVARCHAR(255))																							AS [Note To Vendor]	
	,			CAST(pha.[BILLTO_BU_ID]	 AS NVARCHAR(255))																							AS [Bill To BU ID]
	,			CAST(pha.[SOLDTO_LE_ID]	 AS NVARCHAR(255))																							AS [Sold To BU ID]
	,			CAST(pha.[REQ_BU_ID] AS NVARCHAR(255))																									AS [Req BU ID]
	,			CAST(pha.[SHIP_TO_LOCATION_ID] AS NVARCHAR(255))																						AS [Ship To Location ID]
	,			CAST(pha.[BILL_TO_LOCATION_ID] AS NVARCHAR(255))																						AS [Bill To Location ID]
	,			CAST(LEFT(pha.[CLOSED_DATE],10) AS NVARCHAR(255))																						AS [Purchased Document Closed Date]						
	,			CAST(pha.[RATE]		 AS NVARCHAR(255))																								AS [Currency Conversion Rate]	
	,			CAST(pha.[NOTE_TO_RECEIVER]	 AS NVARCHAR(255))																						AS [Note To Receiver]
	,			CAST(pha.[COMMENTS]		 AS NVARCHAR(255))																							AS [Purchase Document Description]		
	,			CAST(pha.[FROM_HEADER_ID]	 AS NVARCHAR(255))																						AS [From Header ID]
	,			CAST(pha.[FROM_TYPE_LOOKUP_CODE]	 AS NVARCHAR(255))																					AS [From Type Lookup Code]
	,			CAST(pha.[FOB_LOOKUP_CODE]		 AS NVARCHAR(255))																					AS [Sustainability Position]			
	,			CAST(LEFT(pha.[ATTRIBUTE_DATE1],10)		 AS NVARCHAR(255))																			AS [Deal Date]		
	,			CAST(pha.[ATTRIBUTE5]	 AS NVARCHAR(255))																							AS [Transporter Name]	
	,			CAST(CASE WHEN pha.[ATTRIBUTE_NUMBER2] IS NULL THEN '0' ELSE pha.[ATTRIBUTE_NUMBER2] END AS NUMERIC(28,2))		AS [Transporter Unit Price]	
	,			CAST(pha.[ATTRIBUTE9] AS NVARCHAR(255))																								AS [FFA Spec]				
	,			CAST(CASE WHEN pha.[ATTRIBUTE_NUMBER3] IS NULL THEN '0' ELSE pha.[ATTRIBUTE_NUMBER3] END AS NUMERIC(28,2))		AS [Transporter Amount]		
	,			CAST(pha.[ATTRIBUTE18] AS NVARCHAR(255))																								AS [Ultimo Order]		
	,			CAST(pha.[ATTRIBUTE12]	 AS NVARCHAR(255))																							AS [Transporter Currency]	
	,			CAST(pha.[ATTRIBUTE7] AS NVARCHAR(255))																								AS [Additional Charges 1 Supplier]	
	,			CAST(CASE WHEN pha.[ATTRIBUTE_NUMBER4] IS NULL THEN '0' ELSE pha.[ATTRIBUTE_NUMBER4] END AS NUMERIC(28,2))		AS [Additional Charges 1 Unit Price]
	,			CAST(CASE WHEN pha.[ATTRIBUTE_NUMBER5] IS NULL THEN '0' ELSE pha.[ATTRIBUTE_NUMBER5] END AS NUMERIC(28,2))		AS [Additional Charges 1 Amount]
	,			CAST(pha.[ATTRIBUTE13] AS NVARCHAR(255))																								AS [Additional Charges 1 Currency]
	,			CAST(pha.[ATTRIBUTE17] AS NVARCHAR(255))																								AS [Additional Charges 1 Description]
	,			CAST(pha.[ATTRIBUTE12]	 AS NVARCHAR(255))																							AS [Additional Charges 2 Supplier]
	,			CAST(CASE WHEN pha.[ATTRIBUTE_NUMBER6] IS NULL THEN '0' ELSE pha.[ATTRIBUTE_NUMBER6] END AS NUMERIC(28,2))		AS [Additional Charges 2 Unit Price]
	--,			CAST(CASE WHEN pha.[ATTRIBUTE_NUMBER7] IS NULL THEN '0' ELSE pha.[ATTRIBUTE_NUMBER7] END AS NUMERIC(28,2))		AS [Additional Charges 2 Amount]
	,			NULL																											AS [Additional Charges 2 Amount]
	,			CAST(pha.[ATTRIBUTE15] AS NVARCHAR(255))																								AS [Additional Charges 2 Currency]
	,			CAST(pla.[PO_LINE_ID] AS NVARCHAR(255))																								AS [PO Line ID]
	,			CAST(pla.[LINE_STATUS] AS NVARCHAR(255))																								AS [Line Status]
	,			CAST(pla.[LINE_NUM]	 AS NVARCHAR(255))																								AS [Line NUmber]
	,			CAST(pla.[ITEM_ID] AS NVARCHAR(255))																									AS [Item ID]
	,			CAST(pla.[CATEGORY_ID]	 AS NVARCHAR(255))																							AS [Category ID]
	,			CAST(pla.[ITEM_DESCRIPTION]	 AS NVARCHAR(255))																						AS [Item Description]
	,			CAST(pla.[UOM_CODE]	 AS NVARCHAR(255))																								AS [UOM Code]
	,			CAST(pla.[UNIT_PRICE] AS NUMERIC(28,2))																			AS [Unit Price]
	,			CAST(pla.[QUANTITY] AS NVARCHAR(255))																									AS [Ordered Quantity]
	,			CAST(pla.[FROM_LINE_ID]	 AS NVARCHAR(255))																							AS [From Line ID]
	,			CAST(pla.[VENDOR_PRODUCT_NUM] AS NVARCHAR(255))																						AS [Supplier Item]
	,			CASE
					WHEN CAST(pla.[UNIT_PRICE] AS NUMERIC(28,2)) = 0
						THEN 0
					WHEN pla.[QUANTITY_COMMITTED] IS NULL
						THEN CAST(CASE 
									WHEN pha.[BLANKET_TOTAL_AMOUNT] IS NULL
										THEN '0' 
									ELSE CAST(pha.[BLANKET_TOTAL_AMOUNT] AS NUMERIC(28,2)) - 10
								  END AS NUMERIC(28,2))/CAST(pla.[UNIT_PRICE] AS NUMERIC(28,2))
					ELSE CAST(pla.[QUANTITY_COMMITTED] AS NUMERIC(28,2))
				END																												AS [Blanket Agreement Quantity]	
	,			CAST(pla.[CLOSED_DATE] AS NVARCHAR(255))		AS [CLOSED_DATE]
	,			CAST(pla.[CANCEL_REASON] AS NVARCHAR(255))		AS [CANCEL_REASON]
	,			CAST(poa.[Vendor Site ID] AS NVARCHAR(255))		AS [Vendor Site ID]
	INTO		[Core].[PurchaseContracts]
	FROM		[RAW].[O.PO_HEADERS_ALL] pha																							
	LEFT JOIN	[RAW].[O.PO_LINES_ALL] pla																						
	ON			pla.[PO_HEADER_ID] = pha.[PO_HEADER_ID]
	LEFT JOIN	(
					SELECT		[PO_HEADER_ID]	
					,			MIN([VENDOR_SITE_ID]) AS [Vendor Site ID]
					FROM		[RAW].[O.PO_GA_ORG_ASSIGNMENTS]
					GROUP BY	[PO_HEADER_ID]
				) poa
	ON			pha.[PO_HEADER_ID] = poa.[PO_HEADER_ID]
	WHERE		pha.[TYPE_LOOKUP_CODE] = 'BLANKET'


/********************************************************************************************************
	Step 1.9:	Create core purchase orders table.

				Core.PurchaseOrders is built by joining the tables [RAW].[O.PO_HEADERS_ALL],
				and [RAW].[O.PO_LINES_ALL]

				[RAW].[O.PO_HEADERS_ALL] is filtered for [TYPE_LOOKUP_CODE] = 'STANDARD'

********************************************************************************************************/
	IF OBJECT_ID('[Core].[PurchaseOrders]','U') IS NOT NULL
		DROP TABLE [Core].[PurchaseOrders]
		
	SELECT		CAST(pha.[PO_HEADER_ID] AS NVARCHAR(255))																				AS [PO Header ID]				
	,			CAST(pha.[CURRENT_VERSION_ID] AS NVARCHAR(255))																		AS [Current Version ID]
	,			CAST(pha.[DOCUMENT_STATUS] AS NVARCHAR(255))																			AS [Purchase Document Status]
	,			CAST(pha.[PRC_BU_ID] AS NVARCHAR(255))																					AS [Purchasing BU]
	,			CAST(pha.[AGENT_ID] AS NVARCHAR(255))																					AS [Buyer]
	,			CAST(pha.[TYPE_LOOKUP_CODE]	 AS NVARCHAR(255))																		AS [Purchase Document Type]
	,			CAST(pha.[SEGMENT1] AS NVARCHAR(255))																					AS [Purchase Order Number]
	,			CAST(pha.[VENDOR_ID] AS NVARCHAR(255))																					AS [Supplier]
	,			CAST(pha.[VENDOR_SITE_ID] AS NVARCHAR(255))																			AS [Supplier Site]
	,			CAST(pha.[TERMS_ID]	 AS NVARCHAR(255))																				AS [Terms ID]
	,			CAST(pha.[FREIGHT_TERMS_LOOKUP_CODE] AS NVARCHAR(255))																	AS [Incoterm]
	,			CAST(pha.[CURRENCY_CODE] AS NVARCHAR(255))																				AS [Purchase Document Currency]	
	,			CAST(LEFT(pha.[START_DATE],10) AS NVARCHAR(255))																		AS [Agreement Start Date]			
	,			CAST(LEFT(pha.[END_DATE],10) AS NVARCHAR(255))																			AS [Agreement End Date]		
	,			CAST(pha.[BLANKET_TOTAL_AMOUNT]	 AS NVARCHAR(255))																	AS [Agreement Amount]
	,			CAST(pha.[AMOUNT_RELEASED] AS NVARCHAR(255))																			AS [Amount Released Against Agreement]	
	,			CAST(pha.[CARRIER_ID] AS NVARCHAR(255))																				AS [Carrier ID]			
	,			CAST(pha.[NOTE_TO_VENDOR] AS NVARCHAR(255))																			AS [Note To Vendor]	
	,			CAST(pha.[BILLTO_BU_ID]	 AS NVARCHAR(255))																			AS [Bill To BU ID]
	,			CAST(pha.[SOLDTO_LE_ID] AS NVARCHAR(255))																				AS [Sold To BU ID]
	,			CAST(pha.[REQ_BU_ID] AS NVARCHAR(255))																					AS [Req BU ID]
	,			CAST(pha.[SHIP_TO_LOCATION_ID] AS NVARCHAR(255))																		AS [Ship To Location ID]
	,			CAST(pha.[BILL_TO_LOCATION_ID] AS NVARCHAR(255))																		AS [Bill To Location ID]
	,			CAST(LEFT(pha.[CLOSED_DATE],10) AS NVARCHAR(255))																		AS [Purchased Document Closed Date]						
	,			CAST(pha.[RATE] AS NVARCHAR(255))																						AS [Currency Conversion Rate]
